blocks.name: clim1fr1
blocks.content: A class of sequences of fractions that converge to 1. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm clim1fr1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, nat1))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cn, co(co(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl6breq(c0, cli, nat1, co(nat1, caddc, nat0), w0)
  climadd(hs0, c0, nat1, nat0, cn, nat1, cmpt(s0, cn, nat1), universe, cmpt(s0, cn, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)))), w0)
  climconst(hs0, cmpt(s0, cn, nat1), nat1, cn, nat1, universe, w0)
  nnuz()
  1zzd(w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, cn, nat1), universe))
  mptex(s0, cn, nat1)
  1cnd(w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  eqeltri(c0, universe, cmpt(s0, cn, co(co(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)))))
  mptex(s0, cn, co(co(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0))))
  nnex()
  eqbrtrrd(cmpt(s0, cn, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)))), cli, nat0, cmpt(s0, cn, co(co(c2, cdiv, c1), cdiv, cv(s0))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, cn, co(co(c2, cdiv, c1), cdiv, cv(s0)), co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0))), w0)
  divdiv1d(c2, c1, cv(s0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  syl(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, cn, co(co(c2, cdiv, c1), cdiv, cv(s0))), cli, nat0), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c1), cc))
  divcld(c2, c1, w0)
  divcnv(s0, co(c2, cdiv, c1))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), cn, cmpt(s0, cn, nat1), cc, w0)
  a1i(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, cn, nat1), cn, cc))
  fmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, cn, nat1), cn, cc, nat1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cn, nat1))
  1cnd(wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), cn, cmpt(s0, cn, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)))), cc, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, cn, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0))), cc, w0)
  divcld(c2, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(c2, cc))
  mulcld(c1, cv(s0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  mulne0d(c1, cv(s0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(c1, cc))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  nncn(cv(s0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wne(c1, nat0))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wne(cv(s0), nat0))
  nnne0(cv(s0))
  3eqtrd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, nat1), cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)))), cv(hs0))), co(co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0))), co(nat1, caddc, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  fvmptd3(s0, c0, cv(hs0), co(co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0))), cn, co(co(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0))), cc, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  oveq12d(co(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, c2), co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  oveq1d(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, c2, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1, cmul)
  divcld(co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, c2), co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  addcld(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  eqtrd(co(co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0))), co(nat1, caddc, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)))), co(co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0))), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  divdird(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), c2, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  oveq1d(co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0))), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0))), nat1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  dividd(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  oveq12d(nat1, caddc, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0))), cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, nat1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)))), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  eqcomd(nat1, cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, nat1), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, nat1), cv(hs0)), nat1))
  fvmptd(s0, cmpt(s0, cn, nat1), cv(hs0), nat1, cn, nat1, cc, wcel(cv(hs0), cn))
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, cn, nat1), wcel(cv(hs0), cn))
  eqidd(nat1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  id(wcel(cv(hs0), cn))
  1cnd(wcel(cv(hs0), cn))
  eqcomd(co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0))), cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)))), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  fvmptd(s0, cmpt(s0, cn, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)))), cv(hs0), co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0))), cn, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0))), cc, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, cn, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  oveq2d(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  oveq2d(c1, cmul, cv(s0), cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  divcld(c2, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(c2, cc))
  mulcld(c1, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  mulne0d(c1, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(c1, cc))
  nncnd(cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wne(c1, nat0))
  nnne0d(cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn))
  1p0e1()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cn, nat1))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cn, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cdiv, c1)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)))
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, c2)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cmul, cv(hs0))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cn)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cn.s(s0)

thm clim1fr1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>]1)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(((c1[×]s0)[+]c2)[÷](c1[×]s0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≠ 0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl6breq(c0, cli, nat1, (1[+]0), w0)
  climadd(hs0, c0, nat1, nat0, cn, nat1, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1), universe, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c2[÷](c1[×]s0))), w0)
  climconst(hs0, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1), nat1, cn, nat1, universe, w0)
  nnuz()
  1zzd(w0)
  a1i(w0, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1)∈ 𝕌)
  mptex(s0, cn, nat1)
  1cnd(w0)
  a1i(w0, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltri(c0, universe, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(((c1[×]s0)[+]c2)[÷](c1[×]s0))))
  mptex(s0, cn, (((c1[×]s0)[+]c2)[÷](c1[×]s0)))
  nnex()
  eqbrtrrd((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c2[÷](c1[×]s0))), cli, nat0, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c2[÷]c1)[÷]s0)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, cn, ((c2[÷]c1)[÷]s0), (c2[÷](c1[×]s0)), w0)
  divdiv1d(c2, c1, s0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ))
  syl(w0, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c2[÷]c1)[÷]s0))[~~>]0, (c2[÷]c1)∈ ℂ)
  divcld(c2, c1, w0)
  divcnv(s0, (c2[÷]c1))
  ffvelrnda(hs0, cn, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1), cc, w0)
  a1i(w0, ((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1): ℕ → ℂ))
  fmpti(s0, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1), cn, cc, nat1)
  eqid((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1))
  1cnd(s0 ∈ ℕ)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, cn, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c2[÷](c1[×]s0))), cc, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, cn, (c2[÷](c1[×]s0)), cc, w0)
  divcld(c2, (c1[×]s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ ℕ, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  mulcld(c1, s0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ))
  mulne0d(c1, s0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ ℕ, s0 ∈ ℂ)
  nncn(s0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ≠ 0)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ ℕ, s0 ≠ 0)
  nnne0(s0)
  3eqtrd((c0 ` hs0), (((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1)` hs0)[+]((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c2[÷](c1[×]s0)))` hs0)), (((c1[×]hs0)[+]c2)[÷](c1[×]hs0)), (1[+](c2[÷](c1[×]hs0))), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  fvmptd3(s0, c0, hs0, (((c1[×]hs0)[+]c2)[÷](c1[×]hs0)), cn, (((c1[×]s0)[+]c2)[÷](c1[×]s0)), cc, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  oveq12d(((c1[×]s0)[+]c2), cdiv, (c1[×]s0), ((c1[×]hs0)[+]c2), (c1[×]hs0), s0 = hs0)
  oveq1d((c1[×]s0), caddc, c2, (c1[×]hs0), s0 = hs0)
  oveq2(s0, hs0, c1, cmul)
  divcld(((c1[×]hs0)[+]c2), (c1[×]hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  addcld((c1[×]hs0), c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  eqtrd((((c1[×]hs0)[+]c2)[÷](c1[×]hs0)), (1[+](c2[÷](c1[×]hs0))), (((c1[×]hs0)[÷](c1[×]hs0))[+](c2[÷](c1[×]hs0))), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  divdird((c1[×]hs0), c2, (c1[×]hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  oveq1d(((c1[×]hs0)[÷](c1[×]hs0)), caddc, (c2[÷](c1[×]hs0)), nat1, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  dividd((c1[×]hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  oveq12d(nat1, caddc, (c2[÷](c1[×]hs0)), ((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1)` hs0), ((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c2[÷](c1[×]s0)))` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  eqcomd(nat1, ((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1)` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ, ((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1)` hs0)= 1)
  fvmptd(s0, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1), hs0, nat1, cn, nat1, cc, hs0 ∈ ℕ)
  eqidd((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1), hs0 ∈ ℕ)
  eqidd(nat1, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ∧ s0 = hs0))
  id(hs0 ∈ ℕ)
  1cnd(hs0 ∈ ℕ)
  eqcomd((c2[÷](c1[×]hs0)), ((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c2[÷](c1[×]s0)))` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  fvmptd(s0, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c2[÷](c1[×]s0))), hs0, (c2[÷](c1[×]hs0)), cn, (c2[÷](c1[×]s0)), cc, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  eqidd((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c2[÷](c1[×]s0))), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  oveq2d(c2, cdiv, (c1[×]s0), (c1[×]hs0), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ)∧ s0 = hs0))
  oveq2d(c1, cmul, s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ)∧ s0 = hs0))
  simpr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ), s0 = hs0)
  divcld(c2, (c1[×]hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  mulcld(c1, hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  mulne0d(c1, hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  nncnd(hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ≠ 0)
  nnne0d(hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ)
  1p0e1()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ 1))
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c2[÷](c1[×]s0))))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cdiv, c1)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, ((c1[×]hs0)[+]c2), cdiv, (c1[×]hs0))
  diff.co.s(s0, (c1[×]hs0), caddc, c2)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cdiv, (c1[×]hs0))
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cmul, hs0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, cn)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: isumneg
blocks.content: Negation of a converging sum. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm isumneg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), cneg(csu(s0, c0, c1))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cdm(cli)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr2d(csu(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), cneg(csu(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c1)), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, csu(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, cneg(c1), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c1), w0)
  eqcomd(cneg(c1), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  mulm1d(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  isummulc2(s0, cneg(nat1), c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  negcld(nat1, w0)
  1cnd(w0)
  mulm1d(csu(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isumneg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, -u(c1))= -u(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)))
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c3 ` s0)= c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c2(+, c3))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr2d(sum(s0 ∈ c0, -u(c1)), -u(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), sum(s0 ∈ c0,(-u(1)[×]c1)), (-u(1)[×]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), w0)
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, -u(c1), (-u(1)[×]c1), w0)
  eqcomd(-u(c1), (-u(1)[×]c1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  mulm1d(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  isummulc2(s0, -u(1), c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  negcld(nat1, w0)
  1cnd(w0)
  mulm1d(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), w0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: climrec
blocks.content: Limit of the reciprocal of a converging sequence. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm climrec(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)))

blocks.name: climmulf
blocks.content: A version of ~ climmul using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm climmulf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, co(c1, cmul, c2)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wnfc(s0, c4)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cuz, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cli, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cli, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  climmul(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c5, c6, c3, c7, c4, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cc))
  nfel1(s0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cc)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cc), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cc))
  eleq1d(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cc, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cc))
  nfel1(s0, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cc)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cc))
  eleq1d(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(c4, cv(s0))))))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5))
  nfel1(s0, cv(hs0), c5)

thm climmulf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  ⊣ (w0 → c4[~~>]c2)

  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→(c4 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→(c0 ` s0)=((c3 ` s0)[×](c4 ` s0)))

} = {
  climmul(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c5, c6, c3, c7, c4, w0)

  nffv(s0, c3, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, cmul)
  nffv(s0, c4, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)

  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c5, hs0 ∈ c5)

  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>](c1[^]c2))

  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c4)→(c0 ` s0)=((c3 ` s0)[^]c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)

  mpbird(w0, c0[~~>](c1[^]c2), ((hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(hs0[^]c2))∘ c3)[~~>](c1[^]c2))
  breqtrd(((hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(hs0[^]c2))∘ c3), cli, (c1[^]c2), ((hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(hs0[^]c2))` c1), w0)

  expcn(hs0, c2, (TopOpen ` CCfld))
  cncfcn1((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  eqid((TopOpen ` CCfld))

  mptex(hs0, cc, (hs0[^]c2))
  cnex()
  sylancl(w0, c3 ∈ 𝕌, (c3 : c4 → ℂ), c4 ∈ 𝕌)

  coexg((hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(hs0[^]c2)), universe, c3, universe)
  3eqtr4rd((c0 ` hs1), (((hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(hs0[^]c2))∘ c3)` hs1), ((hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(hs0[^]c2))`(c3 ` hs1)), ((c3 ` hs1)[^]c2), (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4))

blocks.name: climinf
blocks.content: A bounded monotonic nonincreasing sequence converges to the infimum of its range. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.) (Revised by AV, 15-Sep-2020.)

thm climinf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cinf(crn(c0), cr, clt)))

  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr))

  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)

thm climrecf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  climrec(hs0, c0, c1, c3, c4, c2, c5, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))))

  nfel1(s0, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  eleq1d(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))

  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0)

blocks.pretty:
thm climrecf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>](1[÷]c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[~~>]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≠ 0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→(c2 ` s0)∈(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→(c0 ` s0)=(1[÷](c2 ` s0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  climrec(hs0, c0, c1, c3, c4, c2, c5, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3)→(c2 ` hs0)∈(ℂ \ { 0 })), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→(c2 ` s0)∈(ℂ \ { 0 })))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (c2 ` hs0)∈(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  nfel1(s0, (c2 ` hs0), (ℂ \ { 0 }))
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3), (c2 ` s0)∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (c2 ` hs0)∈(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  eleq1d((c2 ` s0), (ℂ \ { 0 }), (c2 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3)→(c0 ` hs0)=(1[÷](c2 ` hs0))), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→(c0 ` s0)=(1[÷](c2 ` s0))))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (c0 ` hs0)=(1[÷](c2 ` hs0)))
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c3)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c3)
  nfeq(s0, (c0 ` hs0), (1[÷](c2 ` hs0)))
  nffv(s0, c0, hs0)
  nfov(s0, nat1, cdiv, (c2 ` hs0))
  nfcv(s0, nat1)
  nfcv(s0, cdiv)
  nffv(s0, c2, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3), (c0 ` s0)=(1[÷](c2 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (c0 ` hs0)=(1[÷](c2 ` hs0)))
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c3, hs0 ∈ c3)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c3)
  eqeq12d((c0 ` s0), (1[÷](c2 ` s0)), (c0 ` hs0), (1[÷](c2 ` hs0)), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c0)
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, (c2 ` s0), (c2 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cc, { 0 })
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)

  syl6eqel(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(nat1)), cv(s0)), cc, cneg(nat1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  3eqtr2d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), cv(s0)), co(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(nat1)), cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cneg(cfv(c1, cv(s0))), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  negcld(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, cneg(cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cc, cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  mulm1d(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  oveq1d(cneg(nat1), cmul, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(nat1)), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cneg(nat1), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(nat1)), cv(s0))))
  eqcomd(cneg(nat1), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(nat1)), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(nat1)), cv(s0)), cneg(nat1)), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  neg1cn()
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, cneg(nat1), cc, cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(nat1)))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(nat1)))
  mulm1d(c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cc), wbr(c1, cli, c2))
  climcl(c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(nat1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cneg(nat1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm climneg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u((c1 ` s0)))[~~>]-u(c2))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[~~>]c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c1 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  breqtrd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u((c1 ` s0))), cli, -u(c2), (-u(1)[×]c2), w0)
  climmulf(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u((c1 ` s0))), -u(1), c2, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1)), c1, c0, c3, universe, w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, -u(1))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, -u((c1 ` s0)))
  climconst(hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1)), -u(1), c0, c3, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1))∈ 𝕌)
  mptex(s0, c0, -u(1))
  negcld(nat1, w0)
  1cnd(w0)
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1))` hs0)= -u(1))
  fvmptd(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1)), hs0, -u(1), c0, -u(1), cc, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eqidd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1)), hs0 ∈ c0)
  eqidd(-u(1), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 = hs0))
  id(hs0 ∈ c0)
  negcld(nat1, hs0 ∈ c0)
  1cnd(hs0 ∈ c0)
  a1i(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u((c1 ` s0)))∈ 𝕌)
  mptex(s0, c0, -u((c1 ` s0)))
  fvexi(c0, cuz, c3)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1))` s0)∈ ℂ)
  syl6eqel(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1))` s0), cc, -u(1), s0 ∈ c0)
  3eqtr2d(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u((c1 ` s0)))` s0), (((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1))` s0)[×](c1 ` s0)), -u((c1 ` s0)), (-u(1)[×](c1 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u((c1 ` s0)))` s0)= -u((c1 ` s0)), s0 ∈ c0, -u((c1 ` s0))∈ ℂ)
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  negcld((c1 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, -u((c1 ` s0)), cc, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u((c1 ` s0))))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u((c1 ` s0))))
  mulm1d((c1 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  oveq1d(-u(1), cmul, (c1 ` s0), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1))` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c0, -u(1)=((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1))` s0))
  eqcomd(-u(1), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1))` s0), s0 ∈ c0)
  mpan2(s0 ∈ c0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1))` s0)= -u(1), -u(1)∈ ℂ)
  neg1cn()
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, -u(1), cc, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1)))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1)))
  mulm1d(c2, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ ℂ, c1[~~>]c2)
  climcl(c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(1)))
  diff.hs0.c(-u(1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: climinff
blocks.content: A version of ~ climinf using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.) (Revised by AV, 15-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm climinff(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cinf(crn(c0), cr, clt)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  climinf(hs0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfbr(s0, cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))
  nffv(s0, c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  nfcv(s0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c1)
  breq12d(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fvoveq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0, caddc, nat1)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))), wi(w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))))
  nfim(s0, w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))
  nfrex(s0, s1, cr, wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  nfcv(s0, cr)
  nfral(s0, hs0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))
  nfci(s0, hs0, c1)
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wrex(s1, cr, wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))
  rexbidv(s1, cr, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  a1i(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wb(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))
  cbvral(s0, hs0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))
  nfv(hs0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  nfbr(s0, cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))
  nfcv(s0, cv(s1))
  nfcv(s0, cle)
  nffv(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  breq2d(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
}

thm climinff(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>]inf(ran(c0), ℝ, <))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℝ))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(c0 `(s0[+]1))[≤](c0 ` s0))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  climinf(hs0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)→(c0 `(hs0[+]1))[≤](c0 ` hs0)), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(c0 `(s0[+]1))[≤](c0 ` s0)))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1), (c0 `(hs0[+]1))[≤](c0 ` hs0))
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  nfbr(s0, (c0 `(hs0[+]1)), cle, (c0 ` hs0))
  nffv(s0, c0, (hs0[+]1))
  nfcv(s0, (hs0[+]1))
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (c0 `(s0[+]1))[≤](c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1), (c0 `(hs0[+]1))[≤](c0 ` hs0))
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c1)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c1)
  breq12d((c0 `(s0[+]1)), cle, (c0 ` s0), (c0 `(hs0[+]1)), (c0 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  fvoveq1(s0, hs0, c0, caddc, nat1)
  chvar(s0, hs0, (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` hs0)))), (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)))))
  nfim(s0, w0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` hs0))))
  nfrex(s0, s1, cr, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` hs0)))
  nfcv(s0, cr)
  nfral(s0, hs0, c1, s1[≤](c0 ` hs0))
  nfci(s0, hs0, c1)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  imbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` hs0))))
  rexbidv(s1, cr, s0 = hs0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` hs0)))
  a1i(s0 = hs0, (∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` hs0))))
  cbvral(s0, hs0, c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0), s1[≤](c0 ` hs0))
  nfv(hs0, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))
  nfbr(s0, s1, cle, (c0 ` hs0))
  nfcv(s0, s1)
  nfcv(s0, cle)
  nffv(s0, c0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  breq2d(s1, cle, (c0 ` s0), (c0 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(s1[≤](c0 ` s0))
}

blocks.name: climdivf
blocks.content: Limit of the ratio of two converging sequences. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm climdivf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, co(c1, cdiv, c2)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wnfc(s0, c4)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cuz, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cli, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cli, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, nat0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  breqtrrd(c0, cli, co(c1, cdiv, c2), co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), w0)
  climmulf(s0, c0, c1, co(nat1, cdiv, c2), c3, cmpt(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), c5, c6, c7, w0)
  climrecf(s0, cmpt(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), c2, c4, c5, c6, universe, w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0))))
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), universe))
  mptex(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0))))
  fvexi(c5, cuz, c6)
  eqeltrd(cfv(cmpt(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), cv(s0)), cc, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  3eqtrd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(cmpt(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), cv(s0))), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  divrecd(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  oveq2d(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), cfv(cmpt(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  eqcomd(co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), cfv(cmpt(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), cc))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5))
  reccld(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  eldifad(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc, csn(nat0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), nat0), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  eldifsni(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc, nat0)
  fvmpt2(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), cc, cmpt(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))))
  divrecd(c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cc), wbr(c3, cli, c1))
  climcl(c3, c1)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cc), wbr(c4, cli, c2))
  climcl(c4, c2)
}

blocks.name: climreeq
blocks.content: If ` F ` is a real function, then ` F ` converges to ` A ` with respect to the standard topology on the reals if and only if it converges to ` A ` with respect to the standard topology on complex numbers. In the theorem, ` R ` is defined to be convergence w.r.t. the standard topology on the reals and then ` F R A ` represents the statement " ` F ` converges to ` A ` , with respect to the standard topology on the reals". Notice that there is no need for the hypothesis that ` A ` is a real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm climreeq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clm, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, cr))
} = {
  syl6rbbr(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, cli, c2), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), c2))

thm climaddf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  nfel1(s0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cc)

  eleq1d(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cc, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))

  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c4, cv(s0))))))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5))
  nfeq(s0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))
  nffv(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  nfov(s0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))
  nffv(s0, c3, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, caddc)

  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))))

blocks.name: ellimcabssub0
blocks.content: An equivalent condition for being a limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ellimcabssub0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, climc, c2)), wcel(nat0, co(c3, climc, c2))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c4, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, co(c5, cmin, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wcel(c5, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4d(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, climc, c2)), wcel(nat0, co(c3, climc, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wral(hs2, crp, wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs0, c4, wi(wa(wne(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(hs2))))))), wa(wcel(nat0, cc), wral(hs2, crp, wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs0, c4, wi(wa(wne(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat0)), clt, cv(hs2))))))))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, cc), wral(hs2, crp, wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs0, c4, wi(wa(wne(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(hs2)))))), wcel(nat0, cc), wral(hs2, crp, wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs0, c4, wi(wa(wne(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat0)), clt, cv(hs2)))))))
  2thd(w0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat0, cc))

blocks.name: limccog
blocks.content: Limit of the composition of two functions. If the limit of ` F ` at ` A ` is ` B ` and the limit of ` G ` at ` B ` is ` C ` , then the limit of ` G o. F ` at ` A ` is ` C ` . With respect to ~ limcco and ~ limccnp , here we drop continuity assumptions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

thm limccog(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈((c1 ∘ c2)[limCC]c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → ran(c2)⊆(dom(c1)\ { c4 }))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈(c2[limCC]c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[limCC]c4))

blocks.name: limciccioolb
blocks.content: The limit of a function at the lower bound of a closed interval only depends on the values in the inner open interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: climf
blocks.content: Express the predicate: The limit of complex number sequence ` F ` is ` A ` , or ` F ` converges to ` A ` . Similar to ~ clim , but without the disjoint var constraint ` F k ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: mullimcf
blocks.content: Limit of the multiplication of two functions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm mullimcf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c2, climc, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c4, c5, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c6, c5, cc))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c5, co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c4, climc, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c6, climc, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

thm constlimc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, climc, c2)), wcel(c0, cc), wral(hs2, crp, wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs0, c3, wi(wa(wne(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(hs2)))))))
  ralrimiva(hs2, crp, w0, wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs0, c3, wi(wa(wne(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(hs2))))))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), crp)), wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs0, c3, wi(wa(wne(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(hs2))))), wcel(nat1, crp), wral(hs0, c3, wi(wa(wne(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c2)), clt, nat1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(hs2)))))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), crp)), wcel(nat1, crp))
  1rp()
  ralrimiva(hs0, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), crp)), wi(wa(wne(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c2)), clt, nat1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(hs2))))
  a1d(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wa(wne(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c2)), clt, nat1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(hs2)))
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(hs2), nat0, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), crp), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0)), nat0))
  3eqtrd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0)), nat0, cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c0)), cfv(cabs, nat0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  fveq2d(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0), co(c0, cmin, c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  syl6eq(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0), co(c0, cmin, c0), co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), cmin, c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  oveq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), cc))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), cc))
  syl5eqel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), cc, c0, w0)
  fvmpts(s0, cv(hs0), c3, c0, cc, c1)

  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.w(wne(cv(hs0), c2))
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)

thm constlimc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[limCC]c2))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ⊆ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, c0 ∈(c1[limCC]c2), c0 ∈ ℂ, ∀(hs2 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs0 ∈ c3,((hs0 ≠ c2 ∧(abs `(hs0[-]c2))[<]hs1)→(abs `((c1 ` hs0)[-]c0))[<]hs2)))))
  ralrimiva(hs2, crp, w0, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs0 ∈ c3,((hs0 ≠ c2 ∧(abs `(hs0[-]c2))[<]hs1)→(abs `((c1 ` hs0)[-]c0))[<]hs2))))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs2 ∈ ℝ+), ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs0 ∈ c3,((hs0 ≠ c2 ∧(abs `(hs0[-]c2))[<]hs1)→(abs `((c1 ` hs0)[-]c0))[<]hs2))), 1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs0 ∈ c3,((hs0 ≠ c2 ∧(abs `(hs0[-]c2))[<]1)→(abs `((c1 ` hs0)[-]c0))[<]hs2)))
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs2 ∈ ℝ+), 1 ∈ ℝ+)
  1rp()
  ralrimiva(hs0, c3, (w0 ∧ hs2 ∈ ℝ+), ((hs0 ≠ c2 ∧(abs `(hs0[-]c2))[<]1)→(abs `((c1 ` hs0)[-]c0))[<]hs2))
  a1d(((w0 ∧ hs2 ∈ ℝ+)∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (hs0 ≠ c2 ∧(abs `(hs0[-]c2))[<]1), (abs `((c1 ` hs0)[-]c0))[<]hs2)
  eqbrtrd((abs `((c1 ` hs0)[-]c0)), clt, hs2, nat0, ((w0 ∧ hs2 ∈ ℝ+)∧ hs0 ∈ c3))
  adantlr(w0, hs2 ∈ ℝ+, hs0 ∈ c3, (abs `((c1 ` hs0)[-]c0))= 0)
  3eqtrd((abs `((c1 ` hs0)[-]c0)), nat0, (abs `(c0[-]c0)), (abs ` 0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3))
  fveq2d(cabs, ((c1 ` hs0)[-]c0), (c0[-]c0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3))
  syl6eq(((c1 ` hs0)[-]c0), (c0[-]c0), ([hs0 / s0]c0[-]c0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3))
  oveq1d((c1 ` hs0), cmin, c0, [hs0 / s0]c0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (c1 ` hs0)=[hs0 / s0]c0, hs0 ∈ c3, [hs0 / s0]c0 ∈ ℂ)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, [hs0 / s0]c0 ∈ ℂ)
  syl5eqel([hs0 / s0]c0, cc, c0, w0)
  fvmpts(s0, hs0, c3, c0, cc, c1)
  oveq1i([hs0 / s0]c0, cmin, c0, c0)
  mp2an([hs0 / s0]c0 = c0, hs0 ∈ 𝕌, F/(s0, c0))
  vex(hs0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  csbtt(s0, hs0, universe, c0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, (abs `(c0[-]c0))=(abs ` 0))
  fveq2d(cabs, (c0[-]c0), nat0, w0)
  subidd(c0, w0)
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (abs ` 0)= 0)
  abs0()
  ad2antlr(w0, hs2 ∈ ℝ+, hs0 ∈ c3, 0[<]hs2)
  rpgt0(hs2)
  brimralrspcev(hs0, hs1, nat1, crp, c3, (abs `(hs0[-]c2)), clt, hs0 ≠ c2, (abs `((c1 ` hs0)[-]c0))[<]hs2)
  ellimc3(hs2, hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  fmptd(s0, c1, c3, cc, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ hs2 ∈ ℝ+))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs1.c(nat1)
  diff.hs1.c(crp)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)

  diff.hs1.c(clt)

  diff.hs0.w(w0)

}

blocks.name: rexlim2d
blocks.content: Inference removing two restricted quantifiers. Same as ~ rexlimdvv , but with bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable restrictions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexlim2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)), w2))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w1, w2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
} = {
  rexlimd(s0, c0, w0, wrex(s1, c1, w1), w2)
  nfv(s0, w2)
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wrex(s1, c1, w1), w2))
  rexlimd(s1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1, w2)
  nfan(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  nfv(s1, w2)
  expdimp(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wi(w1, w2))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

thm rexlim2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w1))→ w2))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 →((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(w1 → w2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
} = {
  rexlimd(s0, c0, w0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w1), w2)
  nfv(s0, w2)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (∃(s1 ∈ c1, w1)→ w2))
  rexlimd(s1, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), w1, w2)
  nfan(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s1, s0 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s1, w2)
  expdimp(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, (w1 → w2))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm divcnvg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c1), co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))), cli, nat0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

} = {
  eqbrtrd(cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c1), co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))), cli, nat0, cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c1), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0))), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  mpteq2dva(s0, cfv(cuz, c1), co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0))), cv(s0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1))), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0))), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  eluznn(c1, cv(s0))
  eqcomd(co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  fvmptd(hs0, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0))), cv(s0), co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), universe, wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  eqidd(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), cn))

thm divcnvg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ)→(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)↦(c0[÷]s0))[~~>]0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqbrtrd((s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)↦(c0[÷]s0)), cli, nat0, (s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)↦((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0))` s0)), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ))
  mpteq2dva(s0, (ℤ≥ ` c1), (c0[÷]s0), ((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0))` s0), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ))
  adantll(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℕ, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1), (c0[÷]s0)=((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0))` s0))
  syl((c1 ∈ ℕ ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)), (c0[÷]s0)=((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0))` s0), s0 ∈ ℕ)
  eluznn(c1, s0)
  eqcomd((c0[÷]s0), ((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0))` s0), s0 ∈ ℕ)
  fvmptd(hs0, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0)), s0, (c0[÷]s0), cn, (c0[÷]hs0), universe, s0 ∈ ℕ)
  eqidd((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0)), s0 ∈ ℕ)
  adantl(s0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 = s0, (c0[÷]hs0)=(c0[÷]s0))
  oveq2(hs0, s0, c0, cdiv)
  id(s0 ∈ ℕ)
  ovexd(c0, cdiv, s0, s0 ∈ ℕ)
  mpbid((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ), (s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)↦((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0))` s0))[~~>]0, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0))[~~>]0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℕ, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0))[~~>]0)
  divcnv(hs0, c0)
  sylancl((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ), ((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0))[~~>]0 ↔(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)↦((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0))` s0))[~~>]0), c1 ∈ ℤ, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0))∈ 𝕌)
  nnzd(c1, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ))
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℕ)
  mptex(hs0, cn, (c0[÷]hs0))
  nnex()
  climmpt(s0, c1, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0)), universe, nat0, (s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)↦((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0))` s0)), (ℤ≥ ` c1))
  eqid((ℤ≥ ` c1))
  eqid((s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)↦((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c0[÷]hs0))` s0)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℕ)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cn)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[÷]s0))
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 ∈ ℕ)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs0, cn, (c0[÷]hs0))
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cdiv, hs0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c1)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: limcperiod
blocks.content: If ` F ` is a periodic function with period ` T ` , the limit doesn't change if we shift the limiting point by ` T ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: limcrecl
blocks.content: If ` F ` is a real-valued function, ` B ` is a limit point of its domain, and the limit of ` F ` at ` B ` exists, then this limit is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm limcrecl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(clp, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, climc, c3)))
} = {

blocks.name: lptioo2
blocks.content: The upper bound of an open interval is a limit point of the interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: elprn1
blocks.content: A member of an unordered pair that is not the "first", must be the "second". (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: elprn2
blocks.content: A member of an unordered pair that is not the "second", must be the "first". (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: limcmptdm
blocks.content: The domain of a maps-to function with a limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm limcmptdm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, cc))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c1, climc, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqsstr3d(c0, cc, cdm(c1), w0)
  dmmptd(s0, c1, c0, c2, cc, w0)
  simp2d(w0, wss(cdm(c1), cc), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cc), wcel(c4, cc))
  syl(w0, w3a(wf(c1, cdm(c1), cc), wss(cdm(c1), cc), wcel(c4, cc)), wcel(c3, co(c1, climc, c4)))
  limcrcl(c3, c1, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm limcmptdm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℂ)
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(c1[limCC]c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqsstr3d(c0, cc, dom(c1), w0)
  dmmptd(s0, c1, c0, c2, cc, w0)
  simp2d(w0, dom(c1)⊆ ℂ, (c1 : dom(c1)→ ℂ), c4 ∈ ℂ)
  syl(w0, ((c1 : dom(c1)→ ℂ)∧ dom(c1)⊆ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ ℂ), c3 ∈(c1[limCC]c4))
  limcrcl(c3, c1, c4)
}

blocks.name: clim2f
blocks.content: Express the predicate: The limit of complex number sequence ` F ` is ` A ` , or ` F ` converges to ` A ` , with more general quantifier restrictions than ~ clim . Similar to ~ clim2 , but without the disjoint var constraint ` F k ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm clim2f(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c3, cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)))))))))
  -| wnfc(s2, c0)
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)

blocks.content: The limit of a function at the upper bound of a closed interval only depends on the values in the inner open interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

thm ltmod(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(co(c2, cmin, co(c2, cmo, c1)), cico, c2)))

  3brtr4d(co(c0, cmo, c1), clt, co(c2, cmo, c1), co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmul, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, c1)))), co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmul, cfv(cfl, co(c2, cdiv, c1)))), w0)

  ltsub1dd(c0, co(c1, cmul, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, c1))), c2, w0)
  remulcld(c1, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), w0)
  rpred(c1, w0)
  zred(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), w0)
  flcld(co(c0, cdiv, c1), w0)
  rerpdivcld(c0, c1, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c2), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(c2, cmo, c1)), cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, co(co(c2, cmin, co(c2, cmo, c1)), cico, c2)))
  rexrd(co(c2, cmin, co(c2, cmo, c1)), w0)
  icoltub(co(c2, cmin, co(c2, cmo, c1)), c2, c0)
  oveq2d(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmul, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, c1))), co(c1, cmul, cfv(cfl, co(c2, cdiv, c1))), w0)
  oveq2d(c1, cmul, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), cfv(cfl, co(c2, cdiv, c1)), w0)
  eqcomd(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), cfv(cfl, co(c2, cdiv, c1)), w0)
  lefldiveq(c2, c1, c0, w0)
  sseldi(c0, co(co(c2, cmin, co(c2, cmo, c1)), cicc, c2), co(co(c2, cmin, co(c2, cmo, c1)), cico, c2), w0)
  icossicc(co(c2, cmin, co(c2, cmo, c1)), c2)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmo, c1), co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmul, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, c1))))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, crp))
  sseldd(c0, cr, co(co(c2, cmin, co(c2, cmo, c1)), cico, c2), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(co(c2, cmin, co(c2, cmo, c1)), cico, c2), cr), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(c2, cmo, c1)), cr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  resubcld(c2, co(c2, cmo, c1), w0)
  modcld(c2, c1, w0)
  rexrd(c2, w0)
  icossre(co(c2, cmin, co(c2, cmo, c1)), c2)
  modval(c0, c1)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c2, cmo, c1), co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmul, cfv(cfl, co(c2, cdiv, c1))))), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c1, crp))
  modval(c2, c1)

blocks.name: islpcn

blocks.name: lptre2pt
blocks.content: If a set in the real line has a limit point than it contains two distinct points that are closer than a given distance. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm lptre2pt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s1))), clt, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wne(cfv(cfv(clp, c2), c0), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s1))), clt, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(clp, c2), c0)))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(clp, c2), c0))), wne(cfv(cfv(clp, c2), c0), emptycls))
  n0(hs0, cfv(cfv(clp, c2), c0))
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(clp, c2), c0))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s1))), clt, c1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2)), cioo, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c1, cdiv, nat2))), csn(cv(hs0))))))

blocks.name: limsupre
blocks.content: If a sequence is bounded, then the limsup is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.) (Revised by AV, 13-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: limcresiooub
blocks.content: The left limit doesn't change if the function is restricted to a smaller open interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm limcresiooub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(cres(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), climc, c2), co(cres(c0, co(c3, cioo, c2)), climc, c2)))

  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c2))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cle, c1))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(cres(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), climc, c2), co(cres(c0, co(c3, cioo, c2)), climc, c2), co(cres(cres(c0, co(c3, cioo, c2)), co(c1, cioo, c2)), climc, c2), w0)

  fresin(c0, c4, cc, co(c3, cioo, c2))

blocks.name: limcresioolb
blocks.content: The right limit doesn't change if the function is restricted to a smaller open interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: limcleqr
blocks.content: If the left and the right limits are equal, the limit of the function exits and the three limits coincide. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: lptioo2cn
blocks.content: The upper bound of an open interval is a limit point of the interval, wirth respect to the standard topology on complex numbers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

thm lptioo2cn(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfv(clp, c1), co(c2, cioo, c0))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, clt, c0))
} = {
  syl6eleq(c0, cfv(cfv(clp, c1), co(c2, cioo, c0)), cfv(cfv(clp, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), co(c2, cioo, c0)), w0)
  simpld(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfv(clp, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), co(c2, cioo, c0))), wcel(c0, cr))
  sylib(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfv(clp, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), co(c2, cioo, c0))), wcel(c0, cr)), wcel(c0, cin(cfv(cfv(clp, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), co(c2, cioo, c0)), cr)))
  syl6eleq(c0, cin(cfv(cfv(clp, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), co(c2, cioo, c0)), cr), cfv(cfv(clp, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), co(c2, cioo, c0)), w0)
  lptioo2(c0, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), c2, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  mp3an(wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), co(c2, cioo, c0)), cin(cfv(cfv(clp, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), co(c2, cioo, c0)), cr)), wcel(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), ctop), wss(cr, cuni(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))), wss(co(c2, cioo, c0), cr))
  cnfldtop(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  sseqtri(cr, cuni(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), cc)
  ax-resscn()
  unicntop()
  ioossre(c2, c0)
  restlp(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), cr, cuni(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), co(c2, cioo, c0), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  eqid(cuni(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)))
  tgioo2(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  elin(c0, cfv(cfv(clp, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), co(c2, cioo, c0)), cr)
  fveq1i(cfv(clp, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), co(c2, cioo, c0), cfv(clp, c1))
  fveq2i(clp, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), c1)
  eqcomi(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), c1)
}

blocks.name: 0ellimcdiv
blocks.content: If the numerator converges to 0 and the denominator converges to a nonzero number, then the fraction converges to 0. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: sublimc
blocks.content: Subtraction of two limits. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sublimc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, climc, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c5, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cmpt(s0, c5, c8))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c5, co(c6, cmin, c8)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(c6, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(c8, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c4, climc, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c7, climc, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eltr4d(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, climc, c3), co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), co(cmpt(s0, c5, co(c6, caddc, cneg(c8))), climc, c3), w0)
  addlimc(s0, c0, cneg(c1), cmpt(s0, c5, co(c6, caddc, cneg(c8))), c3, c4, c5, c6, cmpt(s0, c5, cneg(c8)), cneg(c8), w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c5, co(c6, caddc, cneg(c8))))
  negcld(c8, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  neglimc(s0, c1, cmpt(s0, c5, cneg(c8)), c3, c7, c5, c8, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c5, cneg(c8)))
  eqcomd(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), w0)
  negsubd(c0, c1, w0)
  sseldi(c0, cc, co(c4, climc, c3), w0)
  limccl(c4, c3)
  sseldi(c1, cc, co(c7, climc, c3), w0)
  limccl(c7, c3)
  oveq1d(c2, climc, c3, cmpt(s0, c5, co(c6, caddc, cneg(c8))), w0)
  syl5eq(c2, cmpt(s0, c5, co(c6, caddc, cneg(c8))), cmpt(s0, c5, co(c6, cmin, c8)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c5, co(c6, cmin, c8), co(c6, caddc, cneg(c8)), w0)
  eqcomd(co(c6, cmin, c8), co(c6, caddc, cneg(c8)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  negsubd(c6, c8, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
}

thm sublimc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[-]c1)∈(c2[limCC]c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(s0 ∈ c5 ↦ c6)
  ⊣ c7 =(s0 ∈ c5 ↦ c8)
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ c5 ↦(c6[-]c8))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→ c6 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→ c8 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c4[limCC]c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(c7[limCC]c3))
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eltr4d((c0[-]c1), (c2[limCC]c3), (c0[+]-u(c1)), ((s0 ∈ c5 ↦(c6[+]-u(c8)))[limCC]c3), w0)
  addlimc(s0, c0, -u(c1), (s0 ∈ c5 ↦(c6[+]-u(c8))), c3, c4, c5, c6, (s0 ∈ c5 ↦ -u(c8)), -u(c8), w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c5 ↦(c6[+]-u(c8))))
  negcld(c8, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5))
  neglimc(s0, c1, (s0 ∈ c5 ↦ -u(c8)), c3, c7, c5, c8, w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c5 ↦ -u(c8)))
  eqcomd((c0[-]c1), (c0[+]-u(c1)), w0)
  negsubd(c0, c1, w0)
  sseldi(c0, cc, (c4[limCC]c3), w0)
  limccl(c4, c3)
  sseldi(c1, cc, (c7[limCC]c3), w0)
  limccl(c7, c3)
  oveq1d(c2, climc, c3, (s0 ∈ c5 ↦(c6[+]-u(c8))), w0)
  syl5eq(c2, (s0 ∈ c5 ↦(c6[+]-u(c8))), (s0 ∈ c5 ↦(c6[-]c8)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c5, (c6[-]c8), (c6[+]-u(c8)), w0)
  eqcomd((c6[-]c8), (c6[+]-u(c8)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5))
  negsubd(c6, c8, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5))
}

  simp3d(w0, wcel(c2, cc), wf(c3, cdm(c3), cc), wss(cdm(c3), cc))
  syl(w0, w3a(wf(c3, cdm(c3), cc), wss(cdm(c3), cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(c0, co(c3, climc, c2)))

blocks.name: limclr
blocks.content: For a limit point, both from the left and from the right, of the domain, the limit of the function exits only if the left and the right limits are equal. In this case, the three limits coincide. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm limclr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wb(wne(co(c0, climc, c1), emptycls), wceq(c2, c3)), wi(wceq(c2, c3), wcel(c2, co(c0, climc, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, cr))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c5, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c6), cin(c5, co(cmnf, cioo, c1)))))

} = {
  jca(w0, wb(wne(co(c0, climc, c1), emptycls), wceq(c2, c3)), wi(wceq(c2, c3), wcel(c2, co(c0, climc, c1))))
  impbid(w0, wne(co(c0, climc, c1), emptycls), wceq(c2, c3))

  ex(w0, wn(wceq(c2, c3)), wn(wne(co(c0, climc, c1), emptycls)))
  sylan2(w0, wn(wceq(c2, c3)), wn(wne(co(c0, climc, c1), emptycls)), wne(c2, c3))
  neqne(c2, c3)
  sylibr(wa(w0, wne(c2, c3)), wn(wne(co(c0, climc, c1), emptycls)), wceq(co(c0, climc, c1), emptycls))
  limclner(c0, c1, c4, c5, c6, c2, c3, wa(w0, wne(c2, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wne(c2, c3), wss(c5, cr))
  adantr(w0, wne(c2, c3), wf(c0, c5, cc))
  adantr(w0, wne(c2, c3), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c6), cin(c5, co(cmnf, cioo, c1)))))
  adantr(w0, wne(c2, c3), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c6), cin(c5, co(c1, cioo, cpnf)))))

  simpr(w0, wne(c2, c3))
  nne(co(c0, climc, c1), emptycls)
  ex(w0, wceq(c2, c3), wne(co(c0, climc, c1), emptycls))
  ne0d(co(c0, climc, c1), c2, wa(w0, wceq(c2, c3)))

  eqeltri(c6, ctop, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))

}
blocks.pretty:
thm limclr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(((c0[limCC]c1)≠ ∅ ↔ c2 = c3)∧(c2 = c3 → c2 ∈(c0[limCC]c1))))
  ⊣ c4 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ c6 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c5 → ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈((limPt ` c6)`(c5 ⋂(-∞[(,)]c1))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈((limPt ` c6)`(c5 ⋂(c1[(,)]+∞))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈((c0 |`(-∞[(,)]c1))[limCC]c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈((c0 |`(c1[(,)]+∞))[limCC]c1))
} = {
  jca(w0, ((c0[limCC]c1)≠ ∅ ↔ c2 = c3), (c2 = c3 → c2 ∈(c0[limCC]c1)))
  impbid(w0, (c0[limCC]c1)≠ ∅, c2 = c3)
  con4d(w0, (c0[limCC]c1)≠ ∅, c2 = c3)
  ex(w0, ¬ c2 = c3, ¬(c0[limCC]c1)≠ ∅)
  sylan2(w0, ¬ c2 = c3, ¬(c0[limCC]c1)≠ ∅, c2 ≠ c3)
  neqne(c2, c3)
  sylibr((w0 ∧ c2 ≠ c3), ¬(c0[limCC]c1)≠ ∅, (c0[limCC]c1)= ∅)
  limclner(c0, c1, c4, c5, c6, c2, c3, (w0 ∧ c2 ≠ c3))
  adantr(w0, c2 ≠ c3, c5 ⊆ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, c2 ≠ c3, (c0 : c5 → ℂ))
  adantr(w0, c2 ≠ c3, c1 ∈((limPt ` c6)`(c5 ⋂(-∞[(,)]c1))))
  adantr(w0, c2 ≠ c3, c1 ∈((limPt ` c6)`(c5 ⋂(c1[(,)]+∞))))
  adantr(w0, c2 ≠ c3, c2 ∈((c0 |`(-∞[(,)]c1))[limCC]c1))
  adantr(w0, c2 ≠ c3, c3 ∈((c0 |`(c1[(,)]+∞))[limCC]c1))
  simpr(w0, c2 ≠ c3)
  nne((c0[limCC]c1), emptycls)
  ex(w0, c2 = c3, (c0[limCC]c1)≠ ∅)
  ne0d((c0[limCC]c1), c2, (w0 ∧ c2 = c3))
  ex(w0, c2 = c3, c2 ∈(c0[limCC]c1))
  limcleqr(c2, c0, c1, c4, c5, c6, c3, (w0 ∧ c2 = c3))
  adantr(w0, c2 = c3, c5 ⊆ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, c2 = c3, (c0 : c5 → ℂ))
  adantr(w0, c2 = c3, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  sseldi(c1, cr, ((limPt ` c6)`(c5 ⋂(-∞[(,)]c1))), w0)
  mp2an(((limPt ` c6)`(c5 ⋂(-∞[(,)]c1)))⊆ ℝ, c6 ∈ Top, (c5 ⋂(-∞[(,)]c1))⊆ ℝ)
  eqeltri(c6, ctop, (topGen ` ran((,))))
  retop()
  sstri((c5 ⋂(-∞[(,)]c1)), cr, (-∞[(,)]c1))
  inss2(c5, (-∞[(,)]c1))
  ioossre(cmnf, c1)
  lpss(c6, (c5 ⋂(-∞[(,)]c1)), cr)
  eqtri(cr, ⋃ c6, ⋃(topGen ` ran((,))))
  uniretop()
  unieqi((topGen ` ran((,))), c6)
  eqcomi((topGen ` ran((,))), c6)
  adantr(w0, c2 = c3, c2 ∈((c0 |`(-∞[(,)]c1))[limCC]c1))
  adantr(w0, c2 = c3, c3 ∈((c0 |`(c1[(,)]+∞))[limCC]c1))
  simpr(w0, c2 = c3)
}

thm divlimc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {

  mullimc(s0, c0, co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmpt(s0, c5, co(c6, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c8))), c3, c4, c5, c6, cmpt(s0, c5, co(nat1, cdiv, c8)), co(nat1, cdiv, c8), w0)

  mpteq2dva(s0, c5, co(c6, cdiv, c8), co(c6, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c8)), w0)

thm expfac(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0)))))

} = {

  fvmptd3(s0, c1, cv(hs0), co(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))), cn0, co(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cc, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)))
  oveq12d(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0)), co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0, cexp)

thm expfac(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℂ → c1[~~>]0)

blocks.name: climconstmpt
blocks.content: A constant sequence converges to its value. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm climconstmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cli, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl5eqbrr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cli, c1, cxp(c0, csn(c1)), w0)
  fconstmpt(s0, c0, c1)
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), cli, c1), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cz))
  climconst2(c1, c2, c0)
  eqsstri(cfv(cuz, c2), c0, c0)
  eqcomi(cfv(cuz, c2), c0)
  ssid(c0)
  fvexi(c0, cuz, c2)
}

blocks.name: climresmpt
blocks.content: A function restricted to upper integers converges iff the original function converges. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm climresmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c2, cli, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c6), c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c2, cli, c1), wbr(cres(c2, cfv(cuz, c6)), cli, c1))
  breq1d(c0, cli, c1, cres(c2, cfv(cuz, c6)), w0)
  3eqtrrd(c0, cres(c2, cfv(cuz, c6)), cres(cmpt(s0, c3, c5), cfv(cuz, c6)), cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c6), c5), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cres(c2, cfv(cuz, c6)), cres(cmpt(s0, c3, c5), cfv(cuz, c6))))
  reseq1i(c2, cfv(cuz, c6), cmpt(s0, c3, c5))
  syl(w0, wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c3, c5), cfv(cuz, c6)), cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c6), c5)), wss(cfv(cuz, c6), c3))
  syl6sseqr(cfv(cuz, c6), c3, cfv(cuz, c4), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cfv(cuz, c6), cfv(cuz, c4)), wcel(c6, cfv(cuz, c4)))
  uzss(c6, c4)
  resmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c6), c3, c5)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c6), c5), c0))
  eqcomi(cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c6), c5), c0)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(cres(c2, cfv(cuz, c6)), cli, c1), wbr(c2, cli, c1)), wcel(c6, cz), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, cz), wcel(c6, cfv(cuz, c4)))
  syl6eleq(c6, cfv(cuz, c4), c3, w0)
  eluzelz(c6, c4)
  syl5eqel(c2, universe, cmpt(s0, c3, c5), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c3, c5), universe))
  mptex(s0, c3, c5)
  fvexi(c3, cuz, c4)
  climres(c6, c2, universe, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c6)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
}

thm climresmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[~~>]c1 ↔ c2[~~>]c1))
  ⊣ c3 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c5)

  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c6)↦ c5)

  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, c0[~~>]c1, c2[~~>]c1, (c2 |`(ℤ≥ ` c6))[~~>]c1)
  breq1d(c0, cli, c1, (c2 |`(ℤ≥ ` c6)), w0)
  3eqtrrd(c0, (c2 |`(ℤ≥ ` c6)), ((s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c5)|`(ℤ≥ ` c6)), (s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c6)↦ c5), w0)
  a1i(w0, (c2 |`(ℤ≥ ` c6))=((s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c5)|`(ℤ≥ ` c6)))

  syl(w0, ((s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c5)|`(ℤ≥ ` c6))=(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c6)↦ c5), (ℤ≥ ` c6)⊆ c3)
  syl6sseqr((ℤ≥ ` c6), c3, (ℤ≥ ` c4), w0)
  syl(w0, (ℤ≥ ` c6)⊆(ℤ≥ ` c4), c6 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4))
  uzss(c6, c4)
  resmpt(s0, (ℤ≥ ` c6), c3, c5)
  a1i(w0, (s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c6)↦ c5)= c0)
  eqcomi((s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c6)↦ c5), c0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c2 |`(ℤ≥ ` c6))[~~>]c1 ↔ c2[~~>]c1), c6 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl(w0, c6 ∈ ℤ, c6 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4))
  syl6eleq(c6, (ℤ≥ ` c4), c3, w0)
  eluzelz(c6, c4)
  syl5eqel(c2, universe, (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c5), w0)
  a1i(w0, (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c5)∈ 𝕌)
  mptex(s0, c3, c5)
  fvexi(c3, cuz, c4)
  climres(c6, c2, universe, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c6)

thm climsubmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cli, co(c3, cmin, c4)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cli, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cli, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  climsub(hs0, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), c3, c4, c0, c5, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), universe))
  mptex(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))
  fvexi(c0, cuz, c5)
  eqeltrd(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), cc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(hs0)), cc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(hs0))), co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmin, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cv(hs0)), co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmin, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmin, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), universe))
  ovexd(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmin, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  fvmptf(s0, cv(hs0), c0, co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmin, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), universe, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(c1, cmin, c2))
  nfov(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmin, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcv(s0, cmin)
  oveq12d(c1, cmin, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)))
  oveq12d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  eleq1d(c1, cc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fvmptf(s0, cv(hs0), c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c1)
  nfcsb1(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cc))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cc))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfel(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cc)
  nfcv(s0, cc)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cc))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c2, cc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fvmptf(s0, cv(hs0), c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cc, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c2)
  nfcsb1(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
}

thm climsubmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[-]c2))[~~>](c3[-]c4))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)[~~>]c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)[~~>]c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  climsub(hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[-]c2)), c3, c4, c0, c5, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), universe, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[-]c2))∈ 𝕌)
  mptex(s0, c0, (c1[-]c2))
  fvexi(c0, cuz, c5)
  eqeltrd(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0), cc, [hs0 / s0]c1, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  eqeltrd(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)` hs0), cc, [hs0 / s0]c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  eqtr4d(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[-]c2))` hs0), (((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0)[-]((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)` hs0)), ([hs0 / s0]c1[-][hs0 / s0]c2), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[-]c2))` hs0)=([hs0 / s0]c1[-][hs0 / s0]c2), hs0 ∈ c0, ([hs0 / s0]c1[-][hs0 / s0]c2)∈ 𝕌)
  ovexd([hs0 / s0]c1, cmin, [hs0 / s0]c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  fvmptf(s0, hs0, c0, ([hs0 / s0]c1[-][hs0 / s0]c2), universe, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[-]c2)), (c1[-]c2))
  nfov(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, cmin, [hs0 / s0]c2)
  nfcv(s0, cmin)
  oveq12d(c1, cmin, c2, [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c2, s0 = hs0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[-]c2)))
  oveq12d(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0), cmin, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)` hs0), [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0)=[hs0 / s0]c1, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)→[hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ)
  nfel1(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, cc)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ ℂ, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  fvmptf(s0, hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, cc, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c1)
  nfcsb1(s0, hs0, c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)` hs0)=[hs0 / s0]c2, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]c2 ∈ ℂ)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)→[hs0 / s0]c2 ∈ ℂ), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℂ))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c2 ∈ ℂ)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfel(s0, [hs0 / s0]c2, cc)
  nfcv(s0, cc)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c2 ∈ ℂ, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c2 ∈ ℂ)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c2, cc, [hs0 / s0]c2, s0 = hs0)
  fvmptf(s0, hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c2, cc, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), c2)
  nfcsb1(s0, hs0, c2)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c2)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[-]c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

}

thm climsubc1mpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[-]c2))[~~>](c1[-]c3))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)[~~>]c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  climsubmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2, c1, c3, c4, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  climconstmpt(s0, c0, c1, c4, w0)
}

thm fnlimfv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1)))))
  -| wnfc(s1, c4)
  -| wnfc(s1, c3)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, c4, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, c0, c1, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))), c4, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(hs0, c4, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))))
  eqtri(c0, cmpt(hs0, c4, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))), cmpt(s1, c4, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  cbvmptf(s1, hs0, c4, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  nfcv(hs0, c4)
  nfcv(hs0, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  nffv(s1, cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  nfcv(s1, cli)
  nfmpt(s1, s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nffv(s1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))
  nffv(s1, c3, cv(s0))
  nfcv(s1, cv(s0))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  fveq2d(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  mpteq2dv(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1)))))
  fveq2d(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  mpteq2dv(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  fvexd(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1)), w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  diff.cli.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm fnlimfv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)=(~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` c1))))
  ⊣ F/(s1, c4)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c3)
  ⊣ c0 =(s1 ∈ c4 ↦(~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` s1))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, c0, c1, (~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` c1))), c4, (~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` hs0))), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, c0 =(hs0 ∈ c4 ↦(~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` hs0)))))
  eqtri(c0, (hs0 ∈ c4 ↦(~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` hs0)))), (s1 ∈ c4 ↦(~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` s1)))))
  cbvmptf(s1, hs0, c4, (~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` s1))), (~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` hs0))))
  nfcv(hs0, c4)
  nfcv(hs0, (~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` s1))))
  nffv(s1, cli, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` hs0)))
  nfcv(s1, cli)
  nfmpt(s1, s0, c2, ((c3 ` s0)` hs0))
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nffv(s1, (c3 ` s0), hs0)
  nffv(s1, c3, s0)
  nfcv(s1, s0)
  nfcv(s1, hs0)
  fveq2d(cli, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` s1)), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` hs0)), s1 = hs0)
  mpteq2dv(s0, c2, ((c3 ` s0)` s1), ((c3 ` s0)` hs0), s1 = hs0)
  fveq2(s1, hs0, (c3 ` s0))
  adantl(w0, hs0 = c1, (~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` hs0)))=(~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` c1))))
  fveq2d(cli, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` hs0)), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` c1)), hs0 = c1)
  mpteq2dv(s0, c2, ((c3 ` s0)` hs0), ((c3 ` s0)` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, (c3 ` s0))
  fvexd(cli, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` c1)), w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c((~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` s0)` s1))))
  diff.cli.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: climreclf
blocks.content: The limit of a convergent real sequence is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm climreclf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cli, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  climrecl(hs0, c0, c2, c3, c1, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cr)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cr))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfel(s0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cr)
  nffv(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cr)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cr))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  eleq1d(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm climreclf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[~~>]c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c1 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  climrecl(hs0, c0, c2, c3, c1, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2)→(c1 ` hs0)∈ ℝ), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c1 ` s0)∈ ℝ))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), (c1 ` hs0)∈ ℝ)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  nfel(s0, (c1 ` hs0), cr)
  nffv(s0, c1, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, cr)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), (c1 ` s0)∈ ℝ, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), (c1 ` hs0)∈ ℝ)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c2)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  eleq1d((c1 ` s0), cr, (c1 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: climeldmeq
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal, either both are convergent or both are divergent. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
