thm climeldmeq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wcel(c1, cdm(cli))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  impbid(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wcel(c1, cdm(cli)))
  ex(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wcel(c1, cdm(cli)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli))), wcel(c1, cdm(cli)), wcel(c1, c5), wcel(cfv(cli, c0), universe), wbr(c1, cli, cfv(cli, c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wcel(c1, c5))
  fvexd(cli, c0, wa(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli))))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli))), wbr(c1, cli, cfv(cli, c0)), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(cli, c0)))
  biimpa(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(cli, c0)))
  a1i(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(cli, c0))))
  climdm(c0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wb(wbr(c0, cli, cfv(cli, c0)), wbr(c1, cli, cfv(cli, c0))))
  climeq(s0, c0, cfv(cli, c0), c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  breldmg(c1, c5, cfv(cli, c0), universe, cli)
  ex(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(cli)), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(cli))), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(cfv(cli, c1), universe), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(cli, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(cli)), wcel(c0, c4))
  fvexd(cli, c1, wa(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(cli))))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(cli))), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(cli, c1)), wbr(c1, cli, cfv(cli, c1)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(cli)), wbr(c1, cli, cfv(cli, c1)))
  biimpi(wcel(c1, cdm(cli)), wbr(c1, cli, cfv(cli, c1)))
  climdm(c1)
  adantr(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(cli)), wb(wbr(c1, cli, cfv(cli, c1)), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(cli, c1))))
  climeq(s0, c1, cfv(cli, c1), c0, c2, c3, c5, c4, w0)
  eqcomd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  breldmg(c0, c4, cfv(cli, c1), universe, cli)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cli, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cli, c1)
  diff.cli.s(s0)
}

thm climf2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)))))))))
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wnfc(s2, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), cz)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))))
  pm5.21ndd(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  a1i(w0, wi(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wcel(c1, universe)))
  brrelex2i(c0, cli, c1)
  climrel()
  a1i(w0, wi(wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))), wcel(c1, universe)))
  adantr(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  elex(c1, cc)
  syl(w0, wi(wcel(c1, universe), wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))))), wcel(c0, c3))
  ex(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c1, universe), wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)))))))))
  brabga(hs1, hs0, c0, c3, c1, universe, cli, wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s2)), cmin, cv(hs0))), clt, cv(s0))))))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s2)), cmin, cv(hs0))), clt, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)))))))

blocks.name: fnlimcnv
blocks.content: The sequence of function values converges to the value of the limit function ` G ` at any point of its domain ` D ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnlimcnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)), cli, cfv(c3, c2)))
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wceq(c4, crab(s1, ciun(s2, c0, ciin(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cdm(cli))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s1, c4, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  breqtrd(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)), cli, cfv(c3, c2), cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2))), w0)

  simprd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)), cdm(cli)), wcel(c2, ciun(s2, c0, ciin(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))))
  sylib(w0, wa(wcel(c2, ciun(s2, c0, ciin(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)), cdm(cli))), wcel(c2, c4))
  elrab2(hs0, c2, c4, ciun(s2, c0, ciin(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)), cdm(cli)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), cdm(cli)))
  eleq1d(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), cdm(cli), cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  mpteq2dv(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))
  eqtri(c4, crab(hs0, ciun(s2, c0, ciin(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), cdm(cli))), crab(s1, ciun(s2, c0, ciin(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cdm(cli))))
  cbvrab(s1, hs0, ciun(s2, c0, ciin(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cdm(cli)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), cdm(cli)))
  nfiun(s1, s2, c0, ciin(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  nfiin(s1, s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  nfcv(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)))

  mpteq2dv(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))

  nfrab1(s1, ciun(s2, c0, ciin(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cdm(cli)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s2, c0, ciin(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c1, cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)), cdm(cli)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cuz, cv(s2))
  diff.cuz.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cdm(cli)))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, cli)
  diff.cli.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)

blocks.name: climeldmeqmpt
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal, either both are convergent or both are divergent. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm climeldmeqmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cli)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), cdm(cli))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c3, c9))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c9)
} = {
  climeldmeq(hs0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c5, c4, universe, universe, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c0, c1, c6, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c2, c3, c8, w0)
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(c1, c3)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5))
  nfeq(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(c1, c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(hs0), c5))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c5)
  eqeq12d(c1, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c7))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c7), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c5, c0, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c7)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c7)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c7))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfel(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c7)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfcv(s0, c7)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c7), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c7))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, c7, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fvmptf(s0, cv(hs0), c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c7, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c1)
  nfcsb1(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c9))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c9), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c5, c2, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c9)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c3, c9)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c9))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfel(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c9)
  nfcv(s0, c9)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c3, c9), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c9))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  eleq1d(c3, c9, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fvmptf(s0, cv(hs0), c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c9, cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c3)
  nfcsb1(s0, cv(hs0), c3)

thm climfveqmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(~~> `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))=(~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c5 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ⊆ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ c9)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→ c1 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s0, c9)
} = {
  climfveq(hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), c5, c4, universe, universe, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c0, c1, c6, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c2, c3, c8, w0)
  3eqtr4d(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0), ((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` hs0), [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c3, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5))
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5)→[hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs0 / s0]c3), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→ c1 = c3))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), [hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs0 / s0]c3)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c5)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c5)
  nfeq(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c3)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), c1 = c3, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), [hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs0 / s0]c3)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c5, hs0 ∈ c5)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c5)
  eqeq12d(c1, c3, [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c3, s0 = hs0)
  syldan(w0, hs0 ∈ c5, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0)=[hs0 / s0]c1, hs0 ∈ c0)
  sseldd(hs0, c0, c5, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c5, c5 ⊆ c0)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0)=[hs0 / s0]c1, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c7)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)→[hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c7), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c7))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c7)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfel(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c7)
  nfcv(s0, c7)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ c7, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c7)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, c7, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  fvmptf(s0, hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c7, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c1)
  nfcsb1(s0, hs0, c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  syldan(w0, hs0 ∈ c5, ((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` hs0)=[hs0 / s0]c3, hs0 ∈ c2)
  sseldd(hs0, c2, c5, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c5, c5 ⊆ c2)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c5)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), ((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` hs0)=[hs0 / s0]c3, hs0 ∈ c2, [hs0 / s0]c3 ∈ c9)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2)→[hs0 / s0]c3 ∈ c9), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ c9))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), [hs0 / s0]c3 ∈ c9)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  nfel(s0, [hs0 / s0]c3, c9)
  nfcv(s0, c9)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), c3 ∈ c9, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), [hs0 / s0]c3 ∈ c9)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c2)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  eleq1d(c3, c9, [hs0 / s0]c3, s0 = hs0)
  fvmptf(s0, hs0, c2, [hs0 / s0]c3, c9, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), c3)
  nfcsb1(s0, hs0, c3)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c3)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm climd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clt, c3)))))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c4)
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cli, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, crp))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clt, c3)))), wcel(c3, crp), wral(hs0, crp, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs0)))))))
  simprd(w0, wral(hs0, crp, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c2, cc))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(c2, cc), wral(hs0, crp, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs0))))))), wbr(c4, cli, c2))
  clim2f2(hs0, s0, s1, c4, c2, c0, c1, c5, universe, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, universe), wbr(c4, cli, c2))
  brrelex1i(c4, cli, c2)
  climrel()
  rspcva(hs0, c3, crp, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs0))))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clt, c3)))))
  rexralbidv(s0, s1, c0, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clt, c3)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(c1, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clt, c3))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c3, cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clt)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(crp)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clt, c3)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm climd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3))))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c4)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4[~~>]c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→(c4 ` s1)= c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3))), c3 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0)))))
  simprd(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0)))), c2 ∈ ℂ)
  mpbid(w0, (c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0))))), c4[~~>]c2)
  clim2f2(hs0, s0, s1, c4, c2, c0, c1, c5, universe, w0)
  syl(w0, c4 ∈ 𝕌, c4[~~>]c2)
  brrelex1i(c4, cli, c2)
  climrel()
  rspcva(hs0, c3, crp, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0))), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3))))
  rexralbidv(s0, s1, c0, (ℤ≥ ` s0), hs0 = c3, (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0), (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c3, c1 ∈ ℂ, (abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0, (abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3)
  breq2(hs0, c3, (abs `(c1[-]c2)), clt)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(crp)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm clim2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3))))

  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4[~~>]c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→(c4 ` s1)= c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3))), c3 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0)))))
  simprd(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0)))), c2 ∈ ℂ)
  mpbid(w0, (c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0))))), c4[~~>]c2)

  syl2anc(w0, c4 ∈ 𝕌, Rel(~~>), c4[~~>]c2)

  rexbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c3, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0)), ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3)))
  ralbidv(s1, (ℤ≥ ` s0), hs0 = c3, (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0), (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c3, c1 ∈ ℂ, (abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0, (abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3)
  breq2(hs0, c3, (abs `(c1[-]c2)), clt)

  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3))))

blocks.content: Given a sequence of real-valued functions, and ` X ` that belongs to all but finitely many domains, then its function value is ultimately a real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

  eqcom(cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1)), cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))

blocks.name: fnlimf
blocks.content: The limit function of real functions, is a real-valued function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

thm fnlimf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wnfc(s1, c2)
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wf(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdm(cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cr))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s1, ciun(s2, c3, ciin(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cdm(cli))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, c1, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  fmptd(hs0, c0, c1, cr, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), w0)
  fnlimfvre(s0, s1, s2, c3, c2, cv(hs0), c4, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wf(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdm(cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cr))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eqtri(c0, cmpt(hs0, c1, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))), cmpt(s1, c1, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  cbvmptf(s1, hs0, c1, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  nfcxfr(s1, c1, crab(s1, ciun(s2, c3, ciin(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cdm(cli))))
  nfrab1(s1, ciun(s2, c3, ciin(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), cdm(cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cdm(cli)))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcv(hs0, cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  nffv(s1, cli, cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  nfcv(s1, cli)
  nfmpt(s1, s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))
  nfcv(s1, c3)
  nffv(s1, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))
  nffv(s1, c2, cv(s0))
  nfcv(s1, cv(s0))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  fveq2d(cli, cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  mpteq2dv(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c3, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  diff.cli.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnlimf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℝ))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→((c2 ` s0): dom((c2 ` s0))→ ℝ))
  ⊣ c1 = { s1 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ c3, ⋂(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s2), dom((c2 ` s0))))|(s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` s1))∈ dom(~~>)}
  ⊣ c0 =(s1 ∈ c1 ↦(~~> `(s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  fmptd(hs0, c0, c1, cr, (~~> `(s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` hs0))), w0)
  fnlimfvre(s0, s1, s2, c3, c2, hs0, c4, c1, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, s0 ∈ c3, ((c2 ` s0): dom((c2 ` s0))→ ℝ))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  eqtri(c0, (hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(~~> `(s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` hs0)))), (s1 ∈ c1 ↦(~~> `(s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` s1)))))
  cbvmptf(s1, hs0, c1, (~~> `(s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` s1))), (~~> `(s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` hs0))))
  nfcxfr(s1, c1, { s1 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ c3, ⋂(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s2), dom((c2 ` s0))))|(s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` s1))∈ dom(~~>)})
  nfrab1(s1, ⋃(s2 ∈ c3, ⋂(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s2), dom((c2 ` s0)))), (s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` s1))∈ dom(~~>))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcv(hs0, (~~> `(s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` s1))))
  nffv(s1, cli, (s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` hs0)))
  nfcv(s1, cli)
  nfmpt(s1, s0, c3, ((c2 ` s0)` hs0))
  nfcv(s1, c3)
  nffv(s1, (c2 ` s0), hs0)
  nffv(s1, c2, s0)
  nfcv(s1, s0)
  nfcv(s1, hs0)
  fveq2d(cli, (s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` s1)), (s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` hs0)), s1 = hs0)
  mpteq2dv(s0, c3, ((c2 ` s0)` s1), ((c2 ` s0)` hs0), s1 = hs0)
  fveq2(s1, hs0, (c2 ` s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c((~~> `(s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c2 ` s0)` s1))))
  diff.cli.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fnlimabslt

thm fnlimabslt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  -| wnf(s1, w0)

  -| wnfc(s2, c1)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wf(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cdm(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cr))
  -| wceq(c6, crab(s2, ciun(s0, c0, ciin(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), cdm(cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wcel(cmpt(s1, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cv(s2))), cdm(cli))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s2, c6, cfv(cli, cmpt(s1, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cv(s2))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, crp))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

blocks.name: climfveqf
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another have the same limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:

} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wceq(cfv(cli, c0), cfv(cli, c1)), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli))), wceq(cfv(cli, c0), cfv(cli, c1)), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(cli, c0)), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(cli, c1)))

  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0)
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1)
  ndmfv(c1, cli)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

}

thm climfveqf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(~~> ` c0)=(~~> ` c1))

  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, (~~> ` c0)=(~~> ` c1), c0 ∈ dom(~~>))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom(~~>)), (~~> ` c0)=(~~> ` c1), c0[~~>](~~> ` c0), c0[~~>](~~> ` c1))
  mpbid((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom(~~>)), c0[~~>](~~> ` c1), c1[~~>](~~> ` c1))
  sylib((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom(~~>)), c1[~~>](~~> ` c1), c1 ∈ dom(~~>))
  mpbid((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom(~~>)), c1 ∈ dom(~~>), c0 ∈ dom(~~>))
  sylibr((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom(~~>)), c0 ∈ dom(~~>), c0[~~>](~~> ` c0))
  adantl(w0, c0 ∈ dom(~~>), c0[~~>](~~> ` c0))
  biimpi(c0 ∈ dom(~~>), c0[~~>](~~> ` c0))
  climdm(c0)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ dom(~~>), (c0 ∈ dom(~~>)↔ c1 ∈ dom(~~>)))
  climdm(c1)
  climeq(hs0, c1, (~~> ` c1), c0, c2, c3, c5, c4, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom(~~>)))
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ dom(~~>), c1 ∈ c5)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ dom(~~>), c0 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ dom(~~>), c3 ∈ ℤ)
  adantlr(w0, c0 ∈ dom(~~>), hs0 ∈ c2, (c1 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs0))
  eqcomd((c1 ` hs0), (c0 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  climuni(c0, (~~> ` c0), (~~> ` c1))
  eqtr4d((~~> ` c0), (~~> ` c1), emptycls, (w0 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ dom(~~>)))
  adantl(w0, ¬ c0 ∈ dom(~~>), (~~> ` c0)= ∅)
  ndmfv(c0, cli)
  syl((w0 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ dom(~~>)), (~~> ` c1)= ∅, ¬ c1 ∈ dom(~~>))
  mtbid((w0 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ dom(~~>)), c1 ∈ dom(~~>), c0 ∈ dom(~~>))
  simpr(w0, ¬ c0 ∈ dom(~~>))
  adantr(w0, ¬ c0 ∈ dom(~~>), (c0 ∈ dom(~~>)↔ c1 ∈ dom(~~>)))
  climeldmeq(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2)→(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0)))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), (c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  nfel1(s0, hs0, c2)
  nfeq(s0, (c0 ` hs0), (c1 ` hs0))
  nffv(s0, c0, hs0)
  nffv(s0, c1, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), (c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), (c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c2)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  eqeq12d((c0 ` s0), (c1 ` s0), (c0 ` hs0), (c1 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c1)
  ndmfv(c1, cli)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

blocks.name: climmptf
blocks.content: Exhibit a function ` G ` with the same convergence properties as the not-quite-function ` F ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

thm climmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c2, cli, c1)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c5, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c2, cli, c1)), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c0, c4))
  climmpt(hs0, c3, c0, c4, c1, c2, c5)
  eqtri(c2, cmpt(hs0, c5, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cmpt(s0, c5, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c5, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))
  nfcv(hs0, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  nffv(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm climmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[~~>]c1 ↔ c2[~~>]c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)

} = {
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[~~>]c1 ↔ c2[~~>]c1), c3 ∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ c4)
  climmpt(hs0, c3, c0, c4, c1, c2, c5)
  eqtri(c2, (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c0 ` hs0)), (s0 ∈ c5 ↦(c0 ` s0)))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c5, (c0 ` s0), (c0 ` hs0))
  nfcv(hs0, (c0 ` s0))
  nffv(s0, c0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ` s0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  eqeq12d(c1, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))

thm climfveqmpt3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(~~> `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))=(~~> `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c5 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ⊆ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→ c1 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→ c1 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
} = {
  climfveq(hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), c5, c4, universe, universe, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c0, c1, c6, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c2, c3, c7, w0)
  3eqtr4d(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0), ((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` hs0), [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c3, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0)=[hs0 / s0]c1, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c8)
  sseldd(hs0, c0, c5, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c5, c5 ⊆ c0)
  fvmptf(s0, hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c8, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c1)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), ((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` hs0)=[hs0 / s0]c3, hs0 ∈ c2, [hs0 / s0]c3 ∈ c8)
  sseldd(hs0, c2, c5, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c5, c5 ⊆ c2)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c5)
  eqeltrrd([hs0 / s0]c3, c8, [hs0 / s0]c1, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5))
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5)→[hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs0 / s0]c3), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→ c1 = c3))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), [hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs0 / s0]c3)
  nfeq(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c3)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), c1 = c3, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), [hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs0 / s0]c3)
  eqeq12d(c1, c3, [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c3, s0 = hs0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5)→[hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c8), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→ c1 ∈ c8))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c8)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c5)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c5)
  nfel(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c8)
  nfcsb1(s0, hs0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c8)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), c1 ∈ c8, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c8)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c5, hs0 ∈ c5)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c5)
  eleq1d(c1, c8, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  fvmptf(s0, hs0, c2, [hs0 / s0]c3, c8, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), c3)
  nfcsb1(s0, hs0, c3)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c3)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c5)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

thm climeldmeqf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

thm climeldmeqf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ dom(~~>)↔ c1 ∈ dom(~~>)))

blocks.name: climreclmpt
blocks.content: The limit of B convergent real sequence is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm climreclmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), cli, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  climreclf(s0, c0, cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c2, c1, w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c2, c3)
  eqeltrd(cfv(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), cv(s0)), cr, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  fvmpt2d(s0, c2, cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c3, cr, w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm climreclmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)[~~>]c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  climreclf(s0, c0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), c2, c1, w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c2, c3)
  eqeltrd(((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` s0), cr, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  fvmpt2d(s0, c2, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), c3, cr, w0)
  eqidd((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), w0)
}

blocks.name: climeqf
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another have the same limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm climeqf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c2, cli, c1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  climeq(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  nfeq(s0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))
  nffv(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  nffv(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c4)
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0)
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm climeqf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[~~>]c1 ↔ c2[~~>]c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c4 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c4)→(c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  climeq(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4)→(c0 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0)), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c4)→(c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0)))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4), (c0 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0))
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c4)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c4)
  nfeq(s0, (c0 ` hs0), (c2 ` hs0))
  nffv(s0, c0, hs0)
  nffv(s0, c2, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c4), (c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4), (c0 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0))
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c4, hs0 ∈ c4)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c4)
  eqeq12d((c0 ` s0), (c2 ` s0), (c0 ` hs0), (c2 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal, either both are convergent or both are divergent. TODO: this is more general than ~ climeldmeqmpt and should replace it. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

thm climeldmeqmpt3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cli)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), cdm(cli))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(c1, c8))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
} = {
  climeldmeq(hs0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c5, c4, universe, universe, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c0, c1, c6, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c2, c3, c7, w0)
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c8))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c5, c0, w0)
  fvmptf(s0, cv(hs0), c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c8, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c1)
  nfcsb1(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c8))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c5, c2, w0)
  eqeltrrd(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c8, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(c1, c3)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)))
  nfeq(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(c1, c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)))
  eqeq12d(c1, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c8)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(c1, c8)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c8))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5))
  nfel(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c8)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfcv(s0, c8)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(c1, c8), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c8))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(hs0), c5))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c5)
  eleq1d(c1, c8, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  fvmptf(s0, cv(hs0), c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c8, cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c3)
  nfcsb1(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c5)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm climeldmeqmpt3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ dom(~~>)↔(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)∈ dom(~~>)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c5 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ⊆ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→ c1 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→ c1 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
} = {
  climeldmeq(hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), c5, c4, universe, universe, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c0, c1, c6, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c2, c3, c7, w0)
  3eqtr4d(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0), ((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` hs0), [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c3, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0)=[hs0 / s0]c1, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c8)
  sselda(hs0, c5, c0, w0)
  fvmptf(s0, hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c8, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c1)
  nfcsb1(s0, hs0, c1)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), ((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` hs0)=[hs0 / s0]c3, hs0 ∈ c2, [hs0 / s0]c3 ∈ c8)
  sselda(hs0, c5, c2, w0)
  eqeltrrd([hs0 / s0]c3, c8, [hs0 / s0]c1, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5))
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5)→[hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs0 / s0]c3), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→ c1 = c3))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), [hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs0 / s0]c3)
  nfeq(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c3)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), c1 = c3, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), [hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs0 / s0]c3)
  eqeq12d(c1, c3, [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c3, s0 = hs0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5)→[hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c8), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→ c1 ∈ c8))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c8)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c5)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c5)
  nfel(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c8)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c8)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), c1 ∈ c8, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c8)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c5, hs0 ∈ c5)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c5)
  eleq1d(c1, c8, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  fvmptf(s0, hs0, c2, [hs0 / s0]c3, c8, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), c3)
  nfcsb1(s0, hs0, c3)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c3)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c5)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: climfv
blocks.content: The limit of a convergent sequence, expressed as the function value of the convergence relation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm climfv(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wceq(c1, cfv(cli, c0)))
} = {
  syl2anc(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wceq(c1, cfv(cli, c0)), wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(cli, c0)))
  sylib(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(cli, c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)))
  syl3anc(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wbr(c0, cli, c1))
  syl2anc(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wcel(c0, universe), wrel(cli), wbr(c0, cli, c1))
  brrelex1(cli, c0, c1)
  syl2anc(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wcel(c1, universe), wrel(cli), wbr(c0, cli, c1))
  a1i(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wrel(cli))
  climrel()
  brrelex2(cli, c0, c1)
  id(wbr(c0, cli, c1))
  breldmg(c0, universe, c1, universe, cli)
  climdm(c0)
  climuni(c0, c1, cfv(cli, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm climfv(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[~~>]c1 → c1 =(~~> ` c0))
} = {
  syl2anc(c0[~~>]c1, c1 =(~~> ` c0), c0[~~>]c1, c0[~~>](~~> ` c0))
  sylib(c0[~~>]c1, c0[~~>](~~> ` c0), c0 ∈ dom(~~>))
  syl3anc(c0[~~>]c1, c0 ∈ dom(~~>), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌, c0[~~>]c1)
  syl2anc(c0[~~>]c1, c0 ∈ 𝕌, Rel(~~>), c0[~~>]c1)
  brrelex1(cli, c0, c1)
  syl2anc(c0[~~>]c1, c1 ∈ 𝕌, Rel(~~>), c0[~~>]c1)
  a1i(c0[~~>]c1, Rel(~~>))
  climrel()
  brrelex2(cli, c0, c1)
  id(c0[~~>]c1)
  breldmg(c0, universe, c1, universe, cli)
  climdm(c0)
  climuni(c0, c1, (~~> ` c0))
}

thm limsupval3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, c0), cinf(crn(c1), cxr, clt)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cxr))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr, clt)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(clsp, c0), cinf(crn(c1), cxr, clt), cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, c0), cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt)), wcel(c0, universe))
  fexd(c0, c2, cxr, c3, w0)
  limsupval(s0, c0, universe, cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  infeq1d(crn(cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt, crn(c1), w0)
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), c1, w0)
  eqtr2d(cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), c1, cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr, clt)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr, clt))))
  mpteq2da(s0, cr, csup(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr, clt), csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(csup(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr, clt), csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  supeq1d(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr, clt, cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), w0)
  eqcomd(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf))), wss(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr))
  fimassd(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), cxr, c2, w0)
  df-ss(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr)
}

blocks.name: climfveqmpt2
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another have the same limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm climfveqmpt2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(cli, cmpt(s0, c2, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wcel(c1, c7))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  climfveqf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c4, c3, universe, universe, w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfmpt1(s0, c2, c1)
  mptexd(s0, c0, c1, c5, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c2, c1, c6, w0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cv(s0)), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c7))
  sselda(cv(s0), c4, c0, w0)
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c1, c7, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c1, c7))
  sselda(cv(s0), c4, c2, w0)
  fvmpt2(s0, c2, c1, c7, cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
}

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {

  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c7))
  sselda(cv(s0), c4, c0, w0)
  fvmpt4(s0, c0, c1, c7)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c1, c7))

blocks.name: climeqmpt
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another have the same limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm climeqmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cli, c2), wbr(cmpt(s0, c3, c1), cli, c2)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cz))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cuz, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c7, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c7, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c7)), wcel(c1, c8))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
} = {
  climeqf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2, cmpt(s0, c3, c1), c6, c7, universe, universe, w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfmpt1(s0, c3, c1)
  mptexd(s0, c0, c1, c4, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c3, c1, c5, w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c3, c1), cv(s0)), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c7)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c7)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c8))
  sseldd(cv(s0), c0, c7, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c7)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c7), wss(c7, c0))
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c1, c8, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqcomd(c1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c3, c1), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c7)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c7)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c3, c1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c1, c8))
  sseldd(cv(s0), c3, c7, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c7)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c7), wss(c7, c3))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c7))
  fvmpt2(s0, c3, c1, c8, cmpt(s0, c3, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c3, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm climeqmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)[~~>]c2 ↔(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c1)[~~>]c2))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)

  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ ℤ)

  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ⊆ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ⊆ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c7)→ c1 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)

  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c7), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0)= c1, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c8)

blocks.name: limsuppnfd
blocks.content: If the restriction of a function to every upper interval is unbounded above, its ` limsup ` is ` +oo ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: limsupresuz
blocks.content: If the real part of the domain of a function is a subset of the integers, the superior limit doesn't change when the function is restricted to an upper set of integers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupresuz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, cres(c0, c1)), cfv(clsp, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(cdm(cres(c0, cr)), cz))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(cfv(clsp, cres(c0, c1)), cfv(clsp, c0), cfv(clsp, cres(cres(c0, c1), cr)), cfv(clsp, cres(c0, cr)), w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(clsp, cres(cres(c0, c1), cr)), cfv(clsp, cres(c0, cr)), cfv(clsp, cres(cres(c0, cr), c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, cres(cres(c0, c1), cr)), cfv(clsp, cres(cres(c0, cr), c1))))
  fveq2i(clsp, cres(cres(c0, c1), cr), cres(cres(c0, cr), c1))
  rescom(c0, c1, cr)
  eqtrd(cfv(clsp, cres(cres(c0, cr), c1)), cfv(clsp, cres(c0, cr)), cfv(clsp, cres(cres(c0, cr), co(c2, cico, cpnf))), w0)
  fveq2d(clsp, cres(cres(c0, cr), c1), cres(cres(c0, cr), co(c2, cico, cpnf)), w0)
  3eqtrrd(cres(cres(c0, cr), c1), cres(cres(c0, cr), co(c2, cico, cpnf)), cres(cres(cres(c0, cr), cz), co(c2, cico, cpnf)), cres(cres(c0, cr), cin(cz, co(c2, cico, cpnf))), w0)
  reseq1d(cres(c0, cr), co(c2, cico, cpnf), cres(cres(c0, cr), cz), w0)
  eqcomd(cres(c0, cr), cres(cres(c0, cr), cz), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c0, cr), cz), cres(c0, cr)), wrel(cres(c0, cr)), wss(cdm(cres(c0, cr)), cz))
  a1i(w0, wrel(cres(c0, cr)))
  relres(c0, cr)
  relssres(cres(c0, cr), cz)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cres(cres(cres(c0, cr), cz), co(c2, cico, cpnf)), cres(cres(c0, cr), cin(cz, co(c2, cico, cpnf)))))
  resres(cres(c0, cr), cz, co(c2, cico, cpnf))
  reseq2d(cres(c0, cr), cin(cz, co(c2, cico, cpnf)), c1, w0)
  eqcomd(cin(cz, co(c2, cico, cpnf)), c1, w0)
  uzinico(c1, c2, w0)
  limsupresico(cres(c0, cr), co(c2, cico, cpnf), c2, universe, w0)
  zred(c2, w0)
  eqid(co(c2, cico, cpnf))
  resexd(c0, cr, c3, w0)
  limsupresre(cres(c0, c1), universe, w0)
  resexd(c0, c1, c3, w0)
  limsupresre(c0, c3, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm limsupresuz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(limsup `(c0 |` c1))=(limsup ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c1 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom((c0 |` ℝ))⊆ ℤ)
} = {
  3eqtr3d((limsup `(c0 |` c1)), (limsup ` c0), (limsup `((c0 |` c1)|` ℝ)), (limsup `(c0 |` ℝ)), w0)
  eqtrd((limsup `((c0 |` c1)|` ℝ)), (limsup `(c0 |` ℝ)), (limsup `((c0 |` ℝ)|` c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, (limsup `((c0 |` c1)|` ℝ))=(limsup `((c0 |` ℝ)|` c1)))
  fveq2i(clsp, ((c0 |` c1)|` ℝ), ((c0 |` ℝ)|` c1))
  rescom(c0, c1, cr)
  eqtrd((limsup `((c0 |` ℝ)|` c1)), (limsup `(c0 |` ℝ)), (limsup `((c0 |` ℝ)|`(c2[[,)]+∞))), w0)
  fveq2d(clsp, ((c0 |` ℝ)|` c1), ((c0 |` ℝ)|`(c2[[,)]+∞)), w0)
  3eqtrrd(((c0 |` ℝ)|` c1), ((c0 |` ℝ)|`(c2[[,)]+∞)), (((c0 |` ℝ)|` ℤ)|`(c2[[,)]+∞)), ((c0 |` ℝ)|`(ℤ ⋂(c2[[,)]+∞))), w0)
  reseq1d((c0 |` ℝ), (c2[[,)]+∞), ((c0 |` ℝ)|` ℤ), w0)
  eqcomd((c0 |` ℝ), ((c0 |` ℝ)|` ℤ), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0 |` ℝ)|` ℤ)=(c0 |` ℝ), Rel((c0 |` ℝ)), dom((c0 |` ℝ))⊆ ℤ)
  a1i(w0, Rel((c0 |` ℝ)))
  relres(c0, cr)
  relssres((c0 |` ℝ), cz)
  a1i(w0, (((c0 |` ℝ)|` ℤ)|`(c2[[,)]+∞))=((c0 |` ℝ)|`(ℤ ⋂(c2[[,)]+∞))))
  resres((c0 |` ℝ), cz, (c2[[,)]+∞))
  reseq2d((c0 |` ℝ), (ℤ ⋂(c2[[,)]+∞)), c1, w0)
  eqcomd((ℤ ⋂(c2[[,)]+∞)), c1, w0)
  uzinico(c1, c2, w0)
  limsupresico((c0 |` ℝ), (c2[[,)]+∞), c2, universe, w0)
  zred(c2, w0)
  eqid((c2[[,)]+∞))
  resexd(c0, cr, c3, w0)
  limsupresre((c0 |` c1), universe, w0)
  resexd(c0, c1, c3, w0)
  limsupresre(c0, c3, w0)
}

  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(csup(cin(cima(cres(c0, c1), co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cle, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), wss(cin(cima(cres(c0, c1), co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr)), wss(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wss(cin(cima(cres(c0, c1), co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr)))
  ssrind(cima(cres(c0, c1), co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr, cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))

  resimass(c0, c1, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wss(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr))
  inss2(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr)
  supxrss(cin(cima(cres(c0, c1), co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr))
  breq12d(cfv(clsp, cres(c0, c1)), cle, cfv(clsp, c0), cinf(crn(cmpt(hs0, cr, csup(cin(cima(cres(c0, c1), co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt), cinf(crn(cmpt(hs0, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, cres(c0, c1)), cinf(crn(cmpt(hs0, cr, csup(cin(cima(cres(c0, c1), co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt)), wcel(cres(c0, c1), universe))
  resexd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  limsupval(hs0, cres(c0, c1), universe, cmpt(hs0, cr, csup(cin(cima(cres(c0, c1), co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cr, csup(cin(cima(cres(c0, c1), co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, c0), cinf(crn(cmpt(hs0, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt)), wcel(c0, c2))

blocks.name: climinf2lem
blocks.content: A convergent, nonincreasing sequence, converges to the infimum of its range. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

thm climinf2lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cinf(crn(c0), cxr, clt)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  breqtrrd(c0, cli, cinf(crn(c0), cxr, clt), cinf(crn(c0), cr, clt), w0)
  climinf(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(cinf(crn(c0), cxr, clt), cinf(crn(c0), cr, clt)), wss(crn(c0), cr), wne(crn(c0), emptycls), wrex(s1, cr, wral(hs0, crn(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0)))))
  frnd(c0, cr, c1, w0)
  ne0d(crn(c0), cfv(c0, c2), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c0)), wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  uzidd2(c2, c1, w0)
  fnfvelrn(c0, c1, c2)
  mpd(w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(hs0, crn(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0)))), wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  reximdva(s1, cr, w0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, crn(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0))))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, crn(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0))))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, crn(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, crn(c0), wa(w0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0)))
  mpd(wa(wa(w0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  adantlr(w0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0))), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wfn(c0, c1))
  ffnd(c0, c1, cr, w0)
  fvelrnb(s0, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  adantr(wa(w0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wi(wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0))))
  rexlimd(s0, c1, wa(w0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0)))
  nfan(s0, w0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfra1(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  nfv(s0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0)))
  adantl(w0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0)))))
  ex(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0))))
  syl(wa(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  rspa(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  ex(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0)))
  breqtrd(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  simpl(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))
  simpr(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))
  infxrre(s1, hs0, crn(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(s1), cle, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(c0))

blocks.pretty:
thm climinf2lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>]inf(ran(c0), ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ c1 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℝ))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(c0 `(s0[+]1))[≤](c0 ` s0))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  breqtrrd(c0, cli, inf(ran(c0), ℝ*, <), inf(ran(c0), ℝ, <), w0)
  climinf(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, inf(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)= inf(ran(c0), ℝ, <), ran(c0)⊆ ℝ, ran(c0)≠ ∅, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c0), s1[≤]hs0)))
  frnd(c0, cr, c1, w0)
  ne0d(ran(c0), (c0 ` c2), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c0), c0[Fn]c1, c2 ∈ c1)
  uzidd2(c2, c1, w0)
  fnfvelrn(c0, c1, c2)
  mpd(w0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c0), s1[≤]hs0)), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))))
  reximdva(s1, cr, w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c0), s1[≤]hs0))
  ex((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c0), s1[≤]hs0))
  adantlr(w0, s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c0), s1[≤]hs0))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ran(c0), (w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))), s1[≤]hs0)
  mpd(((w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)))∧ hs0 ∈ ran(c0)), s1[≤]hs0, ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0))
  adantlr(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)), hs0 ∈ ran(c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0))
  mpbid((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran(c0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0), hs0 ∈ ran(c0))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ ran(c0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ran(c0), (hs0 ∈ ran(c0)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0)))
  syl(w0, (hs0 ∈ ran(c0)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0)), c0[Fn]c1)
  ffnd(c0, c1, cr, w0)
  fvelrnb(s0, c0, c1, hs0)
  adantr((w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))), hs0 ∈ ran(c0), (∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0)→ s1[≤]hs0))
  rexlimd(s0, c1, (w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))), (c0 ` s0)= hs0, s1[≤]hs0)
  nfan(s0, w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)))
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfra1(s0, c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))
  nfv(s0, s1[≤]hs0)
  adantl(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)), (s0 ∈ c1 →((c0 ` s0)= hs0 → s1[≤]hs0)))
  ex(∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)), s0 ∈ c1, ((c0 ` s0)= hs0 → s1[≤]hs0))
  syl((∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))∧ s0 ∈ c1), ((c0 ` s0)= hs0 → s1[≤]hs0), s1[≤](c0 ` s0))
  rspa(s0, c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))
  ex(s1[≤](c0 ` s0), (c0 ` s0)= hs0, s1[≤]hs0)
  breqtrd(s1, cle, hs0, (c0 ` s0), (s1[≤](c0 ` s0)∧(c0 ` s0)= hs0))
  simpl(s1[≤](c0 ` s0), (c0 ` s0)= hs0)
  simpr(s1[≤](c0 ` s0), (c0 ` s0)= hs0)
  infxrre(s1, hs0, ran(c0))
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, s1, cle, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ran(c0))
}

blocks.content: A convergent, nonincreasing sequence, converges to the infimum of its range. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm climinf2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cinf(crn(c0), cxr, clt)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))

  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  climinf2lem(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs1, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))

  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  nfbr(s0, cfv(c0, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))
  nffv(s0, c0, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))
  nfcv(s0, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))

  eleq1w(s0, hs1, c1)

  fvoveq1(cv(s0), cv(hs1), c0, caddc, nat1)
  sylib(w0, wrex(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))), wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  cbvrex(s1, hs0, cr, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  nfv(hs0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  nfv(s1, wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  bitrd(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  ralbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  breq1(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  a1i(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wb(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))))
  cbvral(s0, hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))

  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))

blocks.pretty:
thm climinf2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>]inf(ran(c0), ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℝ))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(c0 `(s0[+]1))[≤](c0 ` s0))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  climinf2lem(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs1, ((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)→(c0 `(hs1[+]1))[≤](c0 ` hs1)), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(c0 `(s0[+]1))[≤](c0 ` s0)))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), (c0 `(hs1[+]1))[≤](c0 ` hs1))
  nfan(s0, w0, hs1 ∈ c1)
  nfv(s0, hs1 ∈ c1)
  nfbr(s0, (c0 `(hs1[+]1)), cle, (c0 ` hs1))
  nffv(s0, c0, (hs1[+]1))
  nfcv(s0, (hs1[+]1))
  imbi12d(s0 = hs1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (c0 `(s0[+]1))[≤](c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), (c0 `(hs1[+]1))[≤](c0 ` hs1))
  anbi2d(s0 = hs1, w0, s0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1)
  eleq1w(s0, hs1, c1)
  breq12d((c0 `(s0[+]1)), cle, (c0 ` s0), (c0 `(hs1[+]1)), (c0 ` hs1), s0 = hs1)
  fvoveq1(s0, hs1, c0, caddc, nat1)
  sylib(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[≤](c0 ` hs1))), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0))))
  cbvrex(s1, hs0, cr, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)), ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[≤](c0 ` hs1)))
  nfv(hs0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)))
  nfv(s1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[≤](c0 ` hs1)))
  bitrd(s1 = hs0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)), ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[≤](c0 ` hs1)), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, hs0[≤](c0 ` s0)))
  ralbidv(s0, c1, s1 = hs0, s1[≤](c0 ` s0), hs0[≤](c0 ` s0))
  breq1(s1, hs0, cle, (c0 ` s0))
  a1i(s1 = hs0, (∀(s0 ∈ c1, hs0[≤](c0 ` s0))↔ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[≤](c0 ` hs1))))
  cbvral(s0, hs1, c1, hs0[≤](c0 ` s0), hs0[≤](c0 ` hs1))
  nfv(hs1, hs0[≤](c0 ` s0))
  nfbr(s0, hs0, cle, (c0 ` hs1))
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, cle)
  nffv(s0, c0, hs1)
  nfcv(s0, hs1)
  breq2d(hs0, cle, (c0 ` s0), (c0 ` hs1), s0 = hs1)
  fveq2(s0, hs1, c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs1, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1, s1[≤](c0 ` s0)))
  diff.wral.s(s1, hs1, c1, hs0[≤](c0 ` hs1))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, hs0, cle, (c0 ` hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0[≤](c0 ` s0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: limsupvaluz

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(csup(crn(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)))), cxr, clt))
  diff.csup.s(s0, crn(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)))), cxr, clt)
  diff.crn.s(s0, cres(c0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1))))
  diff.cres.s(s0, c0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, cv(hs1))
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: limsupresuz2
blocks.content: If the domain of a function is a subset of the integers, the superior limit doesn't change when the function is restricted to an upper set of integers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: limsuppnflem

blocks.name: limsuppnf
blocks.content: If the restriction of a function to every upper interval is unbounded above, its ` limsup ` is ` +oo ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

thm limsuppnf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

thm limsuppnf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

  ⊣ F/(s2, c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℝ*))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)

} = {
  bitrd(w0, (limsup ` c0)= +∞, ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s1[≤]s2 ∧ s0[≤](c0 ` s2))))), ∀(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[≤]hs1 ∧ hs2[≤](c0 ` hs1))))))

blocks.name: limsupubuzlem
blocks.content: If the limsup is not ` +oo ` , then the function is bounded. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

  ⊣ c2 = if(c7[≤]c4, c4, c7)

  mpd(((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ c5[≤]s1), (c1 ` s1)[≤]c4, c5[≤]s1)

  eqeltrd(c7, cr, sup(ran((s1 ∈(c3[...]c6)↦(c1 ` s1))), ℝ, <), w0)

blocks.name: limsupubuz
blocks.content: For a real-valued function on a set of upper integers, if the superior limit is not ` +oo ` , then the function is bounded above. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

thm limsupubuz(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylib(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cv(s0)))))
  pm2.61dan(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, cz))
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(c2, cz)), wrex(s0, cr, wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(hs2, cr, wrex(hs1, cr, wral(hs0, c0, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cv(hs2)))))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c2, cz), wrex(hs2, cr, wrex(hs1, cr, wral(hs0, c0, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cv(hs2)))))))
  limsupub(hs2, hs1, hs0, c0, c1, w0)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  a1i(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  eqsstri(c0, cr, cfv(cuz, c2))
  uzssre(c2)
  frexr(c1, c0, w0)

blocks.name: climinf2mpt
blocks.content: A bounded below, monotonic nonincreasing sequence converges to the infimum of its range. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: climinfmpt
blocks.content: A bounded below, monotonic nonincreasing sequence converges to the infimum of its range. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

thm climinfmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cli, cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr, clt)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s2, cr, wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cle, c1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  climinf2(hs1, hs0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2, w0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  nfcv(hs1, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))

  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wbr(csb(s0, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c1), cle, csb(s1, cv(hs1), c3)), wbr(csb(s1, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c3), cle, csb(s1, cv(hs1), c3)))

  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wbr(csb(s1, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c3), cle, csb(s1, cv(hs1), c3)))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  nfv(s0, wbr(csb(s1, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c3), cle, csb(s1, cv(hs1), c3)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(csb(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c3), cle, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wbr(csb(s1, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c3), cle, csb(s1, cv(hs1), c3)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  eleq1(cv(s0), cv(hs1), c0)
  breq12d(csb(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c3), cle, c1, csb(s1, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c3), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  csbeq1d(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c3, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(csb(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c3), cle, c1), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))

  ⊣ (s0 = s1 → c1 = c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 =(s0[+]1))→ c3[≤]c1)

blocks.name: climinf3
blocks.content: A convergent, nonincreasing sequence, converges to the infimum of its range. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

thm climinf3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cinf(crn(c0), cxr, clt)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  climinf2(s0, hs0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  mpd(w0, wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s0, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wrex(hs1, cr, wral(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))))
  syl3anc(w0, wrex(hs1, cr, wral(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc)))
  ralrimia(s0, c2, w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc))
  recnd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  climbddf(s0, hs1, c1, c0, c2)
  rexlimdva2(hs1, cr, w0, wral(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1))), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s0, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s0, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wcel(cneg(cv(hs1)), cr), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cneg(cv(hs1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  ad2antlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1))), wcel(cneg(cv(hs1)), cr))
  renegcl(cv(hs1))
  ralrimi(s0, c2, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))), wbr(cneg(cv(hs1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  nfan(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1))))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr))
  nfra1(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))
  ex(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cneg(cv(hs1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  syl21anc(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cneg(cv(hs1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))
  simpll(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  simpr(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  adantll(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))
  rspa(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))
  simpld(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1))), wbr(cneg(cv(hs1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cv(hs1)))
  mpbid(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1))), wa(wbr(cneg(cv(hs1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))
  simpr(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))

  ad4ant13(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), c2, c0, cr, w0)
  simpllr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))
  rspcev(hs0, cneg(cv(hs1)), cr, wral(s0, c2, wbr(cneg(cv(hs1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  ralbidv(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cneg(cv(hs1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  breq1(cv(hs0), cneg(cv(hs1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s0, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs1), cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cneg(cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c2, wbr(cneg(cv(hs1)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cneg(cv(hs1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, cv(hs1))
