thm climinf3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>]inf(ran(c0), ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c2 → ℝ))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c0 `(s0[+]1))[≤](c0 ` s0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  climinf2(s0, hs0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  mpd(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, hs0[≤](c0 ` s0))), ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1)))
  syl3anc(w0, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1)), c1 ∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ dom(~~>), ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)∈ ℂ))
  ralrimia(s0, c2, w0, (c0 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  recnd((c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  climbddf(s0, hs1, c1, c0, c2)
  rexlimdva2(hs1, cr, w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, hs0[≤](c0 ` s0))))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, hs0[≤](c0 ` s0))), -u(hs1)∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, -u(hs1)[≤](c0 ` s0)))
  ad2antlr(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1), -u(hs1)∈ ℝ)
  renegcl(hs1)
  ralrimi(s0, c2, ((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1)), -u(hs1)[≤](c0 ` s0))
  nfan(s0, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1))
  nfan(s0, w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ)
  nfv(s0, hs1 ∈ ℝ)
  nfra1(s0, c2, (abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1)
  ex(((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1)), s0 ∈ c2, -u(hs1)[≤](c0 ` s0))
  syl21anc((((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1))∧ s0 ∈ c2), -u(hs1)[≤](c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), s0 ∈ c2, (abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1)
  simpll((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1), s0 ∈ c2)
  simpr(((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1)), s0 ∈ c2)
  adantll((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1), s0 ∈ c2, (abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1)
  rspa(s0, c2, (abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1)
  simpld((((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ)∧ s0 ∈ c2)∧(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1), -u(hs1)[≤](c0 ` s0), (c0 ` s0)[≤]hs1)
  mpbid((((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ)∧ s0 ∈ c2)∧(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1), (-u(hs1)[≤](c0 ` s0)∧(c0 ` s0)[≤]hs1), (abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1)
  simpr(((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ)∧ s0 ∈ c2), (abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1)
  absled((c0 ` s0), hs1, (((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ)∧ s0 ∈ c2)∧(abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1))
  ad4ant13(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c2, (abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1, (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  ffvelrnda(s0, c2, c0, cr, w0)
  simpllr(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c2, (abs `(c0 ` s0))[≤]hs1)
  rspcev(hs0, -u(hs1), cr, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, -u(hs1)[≤](c0 ` s0)), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, hs0[≤](c0 ` s0)))
  ralbidv(s0, c2, hs0 = -u(hs1), hs0[≤](c0 ` s0), -u(hs1)[≤](c0 ` s0))
  breq1(hs0, -u(hs1), cle, (c0 ` s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, hs0[≤](c0 ` s0))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs1, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(-u(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c2, -u(hs1)[≤](c0 ` s0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, -u(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: limsupvaluzmpt
blocks.content: The superior limit, when the domain of the function is a set of upper integers (the first condition is needed, otherwise the l.h.s. would be ` -oo ` and the r.h.s. would be ` +oo ` ). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupvaluzmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cinf(crn(cmpt(s1, c0, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), c1)), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cinf(crn(cmpt(s1, c0, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), c1)), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt), cinf(crn(cmpt(s1, c0, csup(crn(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cuz, cv(s1)))), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt), w0)
  limsupvaluz(s1, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2, w0)
  fmptd2f(s0, c0, c1, cxr, w0)
  infeq1d(crn(cmpt(s1, c0, csup(crn(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cuz, cv(s1)))), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), c1)), cxr, clt))), w0)
  rneqd(cmpt(s1, c0, csup(crn(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cuz, cv(s1)))), cxr, clt)), cmpt(s1, c0, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), c1)), cxr, clt)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cmpt(s1, c0, csup(crn(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cuz, cv(s1)))), cxr, clt)), cmpt(s1, c0, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), c1)), cxr, clt))))
  mpteq2ia(s1, c0, csup(crn(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cuz, cv(s1)))), cxr, clt), csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), c1)), cxr, clt))
  supeq1d(crn(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cuz, cv(s1)))), cxr, clt, crn(cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  rneqd(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cuz, cv(s1))), cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  resmptd(s0, c0, c1, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  uzssd3(cv(s1), c0, c2)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm limsupvaluzmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(limsup `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))= inf(ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ sup(ran((s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1)↦ c1)), ℝ*, <))), ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)

  a1i(w0, (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ sup(ran(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|`(ℤ≥ ` s1))), ℝ*, <))=(s1 ∈ c0 ↦ sup(ran((s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1)↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)))

  supeq1d(ran(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|`(ℤ≥ ` s1))), cxr, clt, ran((s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1)↦ c1)), s1 ∈ c0)

thm limsupequzmpt2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(limsup `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))=(limsup `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c5))→ c1 ∈ c6)

} = {
  3eqtr4d((limsup `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), (limsup `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)), (limsup `(s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 } ↦ c1)), (limsup `(s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c2 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 } ↦ c1)), w0)

  eqtr2d((limsup `(s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 } ↦ c1)), (limsup `(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c5)↦ c1)), (limsup `((s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 } ↦ c1)|`(ℤ≥ ` c5))), w0)
  fveq2d(clsp, (s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c5)↦ c1), ((s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 } ↦ c1)|`(ℤ≥ ` c5)), w0)
  eqcomd((s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c5)↦ c1), ((s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 } ↦ c1)|`(ℤ≥ ` c5)), w0)

  sylibr(w0, (ℤ≥ ` c5)⊆ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 }, ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c5), s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 }))
  ralrimi(s0, (ℤ≥ ` c5), w0, s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 })
  ex(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c5), s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 })
  sylibr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c5)), s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 }, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
  jca((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c5)), s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  sseldd(s0, c0, (ℤ≥ ` c5), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c5)))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c5), (ℤ≥ ` c5)⊆ c0)
  uzssd2(c5, c0, c3, w0)
  rabid(s0, c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  dfss3f(s0, (ℤ≥ ` c5), { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 })
  resmptf(s0, (ℤ≥ ` c5), { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 }, c1)
  limsupresuz2((s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 } ↦ c1), (ℤ≥ ` c5), c5, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, (s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 } ↦ c1)∈ 𝕌)
  mptexf(s0, { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 }, c1)
  rabexf(s0, c0, universe, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c0, cuz, c3)

  dmmptssf(s0, (s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 } ↦ c1), { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 }, c1)

blocks.name: limsupmnf
blocks.content: The superior limit of a function is ` -oo ` if and only if every real number is the upper bound of the restriction of the function to an upper interval of real numbers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: limsupequzlem
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another have the same superior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

thm limsupequzlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(limsup ` c0)=(limsup ` c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[Fn](ℤ≥ ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[Fn](ℤ≥ ` c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4))→(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  3eqtr3d((limsup ` c0), (limsup ` c1), (limsup `(c0 |`(ℤ≥ ` sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <)))), (limsup `(c1 |`(ℤ≥ ` sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <)))), w0)
  fveq2d(clsp, (c0 |`(ℤ≥ ` sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <))), (c1 |`(ℤ≥ ` sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <))), w0)
  mpbird(w0, (c0 |`(ℤ≥ ` sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <)))=(c1 |`(ℤ≥ ` sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <))), ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <)),(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0)))
  ralrimia(s0, (ℤ≥ ` sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <)), w0, (c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0))
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <)), (c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0), s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4))
  eluzd(s0, (ℤ≥ ` c4), c4, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <))))
  eqid((ℤ≥ ` c4))

  zred(c4, w0)

  sseldi(sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <), cxr, cz, w0)
  rexrd(s0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <))))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <)), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  eluzelre(s0, sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <)), c4[≤]sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <))
  supxrubd(c4, sup({ c2, c3, c4 }, ℝ*, <), { c2, c3, c4 }, w0)

blocks.name: limsupequz
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another have the same superior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupequz(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, c0), cfv(clsp, c1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c1, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c4))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  limsupequzlem(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c4))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c4))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c4))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c4)))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c4)))
  nfeq(s0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))
  nffv(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  nffv(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c4))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c4))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))

  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4))→(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  limsupequzlem(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)

  nffv(s0, c1, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4)), (c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` s0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4)), (c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4), hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4))

  fveq2(s0, hs0, c0)

blocks.name: limsupre2lem
blocks.content: Given a function on the extended reals, its supremum limit is real if and only if two condition holds: 1. there is a real number that is smaller than the function, at some point, in any upper part of the reals; 2. there is a real number that is eventually larger than the function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: limsupre2
blocks.content: Given a function on the extended reals, its supremum limit is real if and only if two condition holds: 1. there is a real number that is smaller than the function, at some point, in any upper part of the reals; 2. there is a real number that is eventually larger than the function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: limsupmnfuzlem
blocks.content: The superior limit of a function is ` -oo ` if and only if every real number is the upper bound of the restriction of the function to a set of upper integers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: limsupmnfuz
blocks.content: The superior limit of a function is ` -oo ` if and only if every real number is the upper bound of the restriction of the function to a set of upper integers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupmnfuz(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(clsp, c0), cmnf), wral(s0, cr, wrex(s1, c1, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cle, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wnfc(s2, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cxr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, c0), cmnf), wral(s0, cr, wrex(s1, c1, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cle, cv(s0))))), wral(hs1, cr, wrex(hs2, c1, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cle, cv(hs1))))))

thm limsupmnfuz(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((limsup ` c0)= -∞ ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(c0 ` s2)[≤]s0)))))
  ⊣ F/(s2, c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c1 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℝ*))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, (limsup ` c0)= -∞, ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(c0 ` s2)[≤]s0))), ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs2 ∈ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(c0 ` hs0)[≤]hs1))))
  limsupmnfuzlem(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, (∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs2 ∈ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(c0 ` hs0)[≤]hs1)))↔ ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(c0 ` s2)[≤]s0)))))
  cbvralv(hs1, s0, cr, ∃(hs2 ∈ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(c0 ` hs0)[≤]hs1)), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(c0 ` s2)[≤]s0)))
  bitrd(hs1 = s0, ∃(hs2 ∈ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(c0 ` hs0)[≤]hs1)), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(c0 ` s2)[≤]s0)), ∃(hs2 ∈ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(c0 ` hs0)[≤]s0)))
  rexbidv(hs2, c1, hs1 = s0, ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(c0 ` hs0)[≤]hs1), ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(c0 ` hs0)[≤]s0))
  ralbidv(hs0, (ℤ≥ ` hs2), hs1 = s0, (c0 ` hs0)[≤]hs1, (c0 ` hs0)[≤]s0)
  breq2(hs1, s0, (c0 ` hs0), cle)
  a1i(hs1 = s0, (∃(hs2 ∈ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(c0 ` hs0)[≤]s0))↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(c0 ` s2)[≤]s0))))
  cbvrexv(hs2, s1, c1, ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(c0 ` hs0)[≤]s0), ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(c0 ` s2)[≤]s0))
  bitrd(hs2 = s1, ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(c0 ` hs0)[≤]s0), ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(c0 ` s2)[≤]s0), ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(c0 ` hs0)[≤]s0))
  raleqdv(hs0, (ℤ≥ ` hs2), (ℤ≥ ` s1), hs2 = s1, (c0 ` hs0)[≤]s0)
  fveq2(hs2, s1, cuz)
  a1i(hs2 = s1, (∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(c0 ` hs0)[≤]s0)↔ ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(c0 ` s2)[≤]s0)))
  cbvral(hs0, s2, (ℤ≥ ` s1), (c0 ` hs0)[≤]s0, (c0 ` s2)[≤]s0)
  nfbr(s2, (c0 ` hs0), cle, s0)
  nffv(s2, c0, hs0)
  nfcv(s2, hs0)
  nfcv(s2, cle)
  nfcv(s2, s0)

  breq1d((c0 ` hs0), cle, s0, (c0 ` s2), hs0 = s2)
  fveq2(hs0, s2, c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

  diff.cv.s(s1, hs2)

  diff.hs2.s(s1)

  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

blocks.name: limsupequzmptlem
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another have the same superior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

thm limsupequzmptlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c2, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cif(c4, c3, wbr(c3, cle, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
} = {
  limsupequz(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c3, c4, c7, w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfmpt1(s0, c2, c1)
  fnmptd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cuz, c3), c1, c5, w0)
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(c1, c5), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eleq2i(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c3), c0)
  mpteq1i(s0, c0, c1, cfv(cuz, c3))
  fnmptd(s0, cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cfv(cuz, c4), c1, c6, w0)
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c4)), wcel(c1, c6), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c4)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  bicomi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c4)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  eleq2i(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cuz, c4))
  mpteq1i(s0, c2, c1, cfv(cuz, c4))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cv(s0)), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c7))))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c7))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c5))
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c1, c5, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c7))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c1, c5))
  sseldd(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cuz, c7), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c7))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c7)), wss(cfv(cuz, c7), c2))
  sseqtrd(cfv(cuz, c7), c2, cfv(cuz, c4), w0)
  uzssd(c7, c4, w0)
  eluzd(c7, cfv(cuz, c4), c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cuz, c4))
  syl6breqr(c4, cle, c7, cif(c4, c3, wbr(c3, cle, c4)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(c4, cle, cif(c4, c3, wbr(c3, cle, c4))), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c4, cr))
  max2(c3, c4)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(cuz, c4), c2))
  eqcomi(cfv(cuz, c4), c2)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c7)), wcel(c1, c5), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sseldd(cv(s0), c0, cfv(cuz, c7), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c7))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c7)), wss(cfv(cuz, c7), c0))
  sseqtrd(cfv(cuz, c7), c0, cfv(cuz, c3), w0)
  uzssd(c7, c3, w0)
  eluzd(c7, cfv(cuz, c3), c3, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cuz, c3))
  syl5eqel(c7, cz, cif(c4, c3, wbr(c3, cle, c4)), w0)
  ifcld(c4, c3, cz, w0, wbr(c3, cle, c4))
  syl6breqr(c3, cle, c7, cif(c4, c3, wbr(c3, cle, c4)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(c3, cle, cif(c4, c3, wbr(c3, cle, c4))), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c4, cr))
  zred(c3, w0)
  zred(c4, w0)
  max1(c3, c4)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(cuz, c3), c0))
  eqcomi(cfv(cuz, c3), c0)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c7)))
  fvmpt2(s0, c2, c1, c5, cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c4)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
}

thm limsupequzmptlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(limsup `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))=(limsup `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c1 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ c7 = if(c3[≤]c4, c4, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
} = {
  limsupequz(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1), c3, c4, c7, w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfmpt1(s0, c2, c1)
  fnmptd(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (ℤ≥ ` c3), c1, c5, w0)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3), c1 ∈ c5, s0 ∈ c0)
  biimpi(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3), s0 ∈ c0)
  eleq2i(s0, (ℤ≥ ` c3), c0)
  mpteq1i(s0, c0, c1, (ℤ≥ ` c3))
  fnmptd(s0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1), (ℤ≥ ` c4), c1, c6, w0)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4), c1 ∈ c6, s0 ∈ c2)
  biimpi(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4), s0 ∈ c2)
  bicomi(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4), s0 ∈ c2)
  eleq2i(s0, c2, (ℤ≥ ` c4))
  mpteq1i(s0, c2, c1, (ℤ≥ ` c4))

blocks.name: limsupequzmpt
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another have the same superior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupequzmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c2, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  limsupequzmptlem(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, cif(c4, c3, wbr(c3, cle, c4)), w0)
  eqid(cif(c4, c3, wbr(c3, cle, c4)))
  diff.cif.s(s0, c4, c3, wbr(c3, cle, c4))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c3, cle, c4)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm limsupequzmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(limsup `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))=(limsup `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c1 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  limsupequzmptlem(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, if(c3[≤]c4, c4, c3), w0)
  eqid(if(c3[≤]c4, c4, c3))
  diff.cif.s(s0, c4, c3, c3[≤]c4)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c3, cle, c4)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: limsupre2mpt
blocks.content: Given a function on the extended reals, its supremum limit is real if and only if two condition holds: 1. there is a real number that is smaller than the function, at some point, in any upper part of the reals; 2. there is a real number that is eventually larger than the function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another have the same superior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

thm limsupequzmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c2, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c2, c1)), cfv(clsp, cmpt(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), cfv(clsp, cmpt(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), w0)
  limsupequzmpt(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c5)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c5)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c5))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c0)
  nfel(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c5)
  nfcv(s0, c5)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c5), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c5))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, c5, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c6)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, c6)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c6))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  nfel(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c6)
  nfcv(s0, c6)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, c6), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c6))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  eleq1d(c1, c6, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(clsp, cmpt(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))))
  fveq2i(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  cbvmptf(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c2, c1)), cfv(clsp, cmpt(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))))
  fveq2i(clsp, cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cmpt(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))

thm limsupequzmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(limsup `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))=(limsup `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c1 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((limsup `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), (limsup `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)), (limsup `(hs0 ∈ c0 ↦[hs0 / s0]c1)), (limsup `(hs0 ∈ c2 ↦[hs0 / s0]c1)), w0)
  limsupequzmpt(hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)→[hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c5), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c5))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c5)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c0)
  nfel(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c5)
  nfcv(s0, c5)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ c5, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c5)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, c5, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2)→[hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c6), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c1 ∈ c6))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c6)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  nfel(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c6)
  nfcv(s0, c6)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), c1 ∈ c6, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c6)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c2)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  eleq1d(c1, c6, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  a1i(w0, (limsup `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))=(limsup `(hs0 ∈ c0 ↦[hs0 / s0]c1)))
  fveq2i(clsp, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦[hs0 / s0]c1))
  cbvmptf(s0, hs0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  a1i(w0, (limsup `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1))=(limsup `(hs0 ∈ c2 ↦[hs0 / s0]c1)))
  fveq2i(clsp, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1), (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦[hs0 / s0]c1))
  cbvmptf(s0, hs0, c2, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: limsupre3lem
blocks.content: Given a function on the extended reals, its supremum limit is real if and only if two condition holds: 1. there is a real number that is less than or equal to the function, at some point, in any upper part of the reals; 2. there is a real number that is eventually greater than or equal to the function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: limsupre3
blocks.content: Given a function on the extended reals, its supremum limit is real if and only if two condition holds: 1. there is a real number that is less than or equal to the function, at some point, in any upper part of the reals; 2. there is a real number that is eventually greater than or equal to the function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupre3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

  -| wnfc(s2, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cxr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wcel(cfv(clsp, c0), cr), wa(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cr, wrex(s2, c1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cle, cv(s0))))))), wa(wrex(hs2, cr, wral(hs0, cr, wrex(hs1, c1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs2), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))))), wrex(hs2, cr, wrex(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cle, cv(hs2))))))))

thm limsupre3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

blocks.name: limsupre3mpt
blocks.content: Given a function on the extended reals, its supremum limit is real if and only if two condition holds: 1. there is a real number that is less than or equal to the function, at some point, in any upper part of the reals; 2. there is a real number that is eventually greater than or equal to the function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: limsupre3uzlem
blocks.content: Given a function on the extended reals, its supremum limit is real if and only if two condition holds: 1. there is a real number that is less than or equal to the function, infinitely often; 2. there is a real number that is eventually greater than or equal to the function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: limsupre3uz
blocks.content: Given a function on the extended reals, its supremum limit is real if and only if two condition holds: 1. there is a real number that is less than or equal to the function, infinitely often; 2. there is a real number that is eventually greater than or equal to the function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: limsupreuz
blocks.content: Given a function on the reals, its supremum limit is real if and only if two condition holds: 1. there is a real number that is less than or equal to the function, infinitely often; 2. there is a real number that is greater than or equal to the function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: limsupvaluz2
blocks.content: The superior limit, when the domain of a real-valued function is a set of upper integers, and the superior limit is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupvaluz2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, c0), cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, csup(crn(cres(c0, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)))), cxr, clt))), cr, clt)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(clsp, c0), cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

blocks.name: limsupreuzmpt
blocks.content: Given a function on the reals, defined on a set of upper integers, its supremum limit is real if and only if two condition holds: 1. there is a real number that is less than or equal to the function, infinitely often; 2. there is a real number that is greater than or equal to the function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupreuzmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr), wa(wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1)))), wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wcel(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr), wa(wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1)))), wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s1))))), wa(wrex(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, c0, wrex(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)))))), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), cle, cv(hs0))))))
  limsupreuz(hs0, hs1, s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2, w0)

blocks.name: supcnvlimsup
blocks.content: If a function on a set of upper integers has a real superior limit, the supremum of the rightmost parts of the function, converges to that superior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm supcnvlimsup(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, csup(crn(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)))), cxr, clt)), cli, cfv(clsp, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(clsp, c1), cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, csup(crn(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)))), cxr, clt)), cli, cfv(clsp, c1)), wbr(cmpt(hs0, c0, csup(crn(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)))), cxr, clt)), cli, cinf(crn(cmpt(hs0, c0, csup(crn(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)))), cxr, clt))), cr, clt)))
  climinf(hs2, hs1, cmpt(hs0, c0, csup(crn(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)))), cxr, clt)), c0, c2, w0)
  fmpttd(hs0, c0, csup(crn(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)))), cxr, clt), cr, w0)
  eqeltrd(csup(crn(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)))), cxr, clt), cr, csup(crn(cmpt(hs3, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs3)))), cxr, clt), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  supeq1d(crn(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)))), cxr, clt, crn(cmpt(hs3, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs3)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  rneqd(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))), cmpt(hs3, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs3))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  feqresmpt(hs3, c1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), c0, cr, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csup(crn(cmpt(hs3, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs3)))), cxr, clt), cr), wrex(hs4, cr, wral(hs3, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs3)), cle, cv(hs4)))))
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wrex(hs4, cr, wral(hs3, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs3)), cle, cv(hs4)))), wrex(hs4, cr, wral(hs3, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs3)), cle, cv(hs4)))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(hs4, cr, wral(hs3, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs3)), cle, cv(hs4)))))
  limsupubuz(hs4, hs3, c0, c1, c2, w0)

blocks.name: supcnvlimsupmpt
blocks.content: If a function on a set of upper integers has a real superior limit, the supremum of the rightmost parts of the function, converges to that superior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

thm supcnvlimsupmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), c1)), cxr, clt)), cli, cfv(clsp, cmpt(s1, c0, c1))))

  supeq1d(crn(cmpt(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), c1)), cxr, clt, crn(cres(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  rneqd(cmpt(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), c1), cres(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqcomd(cmpt(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), c1), cres(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))

thm supcnvlimsupmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ sup(ran((s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0)↦ c1)), ℝ*, <))[~~>](limsup `(s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))

  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqbrtrd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ sup(ran((s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0)↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)), cli, (limsup `(s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ sup(ran(((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|`(ℤ≥ ` hs0))), ℝ*, <)), w0)
  syl5eq((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ sup(ran((s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0)↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)), (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ sup(ran(((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|`(ℤ≥ ` hs0))), ℝ*, <)), (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ sup(ran((s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs0)↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)), w0)

  supeq1d(ran((s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0)↦ c1)), cxr, clt, ran((s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs0)↦ c1)), s0 = hs0)
  rneqd((s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0)↦ c1), (s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs0)↦ c1), s0 = hs0)

  supeq1d(ran((s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs0)↦ c1)), cxr, clt, ran(((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|`(ℤ≥ ` hs0))), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  rneqd((s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs0)↦ c1), ((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|`(ℤ≥ ` hs0)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  eqcomd((s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs0)↦ c1), ((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|`(ℤ≥ ` hs0)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))

  supcnvlimsup(hs0, c0, (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c2, w0)
  fmptd2f(s1, c0, c1, cr, w0)
  diff.csup.s(s0, ran((s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs0)↦ c1)), cxr, clt)
  diff.crn.s(s0, (s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs0)↦ c1))

  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, hs0)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)

  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  sylibr(∅ ∈ ℂ, ∅[~~>]∅, (∅ ∈ ℂ ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℤ, ∀(hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(∅ ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(∅[-]∅))[<]hs0))))))

blocks.name: climuzlem
blocks.content: Express the predicate: The limit of complex number sequence ` F ` is ` A ` , or ` F ` converges to ` A ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm climuzlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  impbida(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)))))))
  jca(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1)), wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))

blocks.name: climuz
blocks.content: Express the predicate: The limit of complex number sequence ` F ` is ` A ` , or ` F ` converges to ` A ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm climuz(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))))
  -| wnfc(s2, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs2, c2, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs1)))))))
  climuzlem(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  a1i(w0, wb(wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs2, c2, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs1)))))), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))))
  anbi2i(wcel(c1, cc), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs2, c2, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs1))))), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))
  cbvralv(hs1, s0, crp, wrex(hs2, c2, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs1)))), wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)))))
  bitrd(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wrex(hs2, c2, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs1)))), wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)))), wrex(hs2, c2, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)))))

  syl6bb(hs2 = s1, ∀(hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(hs1 ∈ dom(c0)∧(c0 ` hs1)∈ s0)), ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(s2 ∈ dom(c0)∧(c0 ` s2)∈ s0)), ∀(hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(hs1 ∈ dom(c0)∧(c0 ` hs1)∈ s0)))

blocks.name: climxrrelem
blocks.content: If a seqence ranging over the extended reals converges w.r.t. the standard topology on the complex numbers, then there exists an upper set of the integers over which the function is real-valued. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: climxrre
blocks.content: If a sequence ranging over the extended reals converges w.r.t. the standard topology on the complex numbers, then there exists an upper set of the integers over which the function is real-valued (the weaker hypothesis ` F e. dom ~~> ` is probably not enough, since in principle we could have ` +oo e. CC ` and ` -oo e. CC ` ). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)
